  3221 000012DB 00                      		db 0
  3222                                  
  3223                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3224                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3225                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3226                                  
  3227                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3228                                  
  3229                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3230                                  ;
  3231                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3232                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3233                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3234                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3235                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3236                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3237                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3238                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3239                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3240                                  ;
  3241                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3242                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3243                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3244                                  ;
  3245                                  ;	uses:	
  3246                                  ;
  3247                                  ;
  3248                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3249                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3250                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3251                                  ;
  3252                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3253                                  
  3254                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3255                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3256                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3257                                  
  3258                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3259                                  
  3260                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3261                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3262                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3263                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3264                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3265                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3266                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3267                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3268                                  
  3269                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3270                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3271                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3272                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3273                                  
  3274                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3275 000012DC 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3276 000012DF 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3277 000012E1 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3278 000012E4 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3279 000012E6 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3280 000012E9 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3281                                  atd1:
  3282 000012EB 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3283                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3284                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3285                                  
  3286                                  atd2:					
  3287 000012F0 53                      		push	bx
  3288 000012F1 51                      		push	cx
  3289 000012F2 52                      		push	dx
  3290 000012F3 57                      		push	di
  3291 000012F4 1E                      		push	ds
  3292 000012F5 06                      		push	es
  3293 000012F6 50                      		push	ax
  3294 000012F7 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3295                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3296 000012FA 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3297                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3298 000012FC C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3299                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3300                                  					; initially no error code.
  3301 00001301 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3302 00001304 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3303                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3304 00001308 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3305                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3306 0000130A C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3307 0000130F EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3308                                  					; return
  3309                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3310                                  
  3311                                  atd3:					
  3312 00001311 53                      		push	bx
  3313 00001312 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3314 00001314 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3315 00001317 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3316 00001319 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3317 0000131B 5B                      		pop	bx
  3318 0000131C 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3319 0000131F 0E                      		push	cs
  3320 00001320 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3321 00001323 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3322 00001325 58                      		pop	ax
  3323 00001326 50                      		push	ax
  3324 00001327 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3325 0000132A BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3326 0000132D EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3327 0000132E E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3328                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3329                                  
  3330                                  atd4:	
  3331                                  
  3332                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3333                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3334                                  				
  3335 00001331 58                      		pop	ax
  3336                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3337 00001332 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3338 00001336 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3339 00001338 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3340 0000133A F9                      		stc
  3341                                  atd5:					
  3342 0000133B 07                      		pop	es
  3343 0000133C 1F                      		pop	ds
  3344 0000133D 5F                      		pop	di
  3345 0000133E 5A                      		pop	dx
  3346 0000133F 59                      		pop	cx
  3347 00001340 5B                      		pop	bx
  3348 00001341 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3349                                  
  3350                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3351                                  
  3352                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3353                                  ;
  3354                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3355                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3356                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3357                                  ;	
  3358                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3359                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3360                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3361                                  ;
  3362                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3363                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3364                                  ;
  3365                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3366                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3367                                  
  3368                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3369                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3370                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3371 00001344 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3372                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3373 00001347 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3374 0000134C 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3375 0000134F 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3376 00001351 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3377                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3378                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3379                                  setc1:					
  3380 00001356 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3381 00001358 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3382                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3383                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3384 0000135A A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3385 0000135D 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3386 00001361 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3387 00001363 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3388                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3389 00001366 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3390 00001369 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3391 0000136B C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3392 0000136E 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3393 00001371 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3394 00001373 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3395                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3396 00001375 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3397 00001378 06                      		push	es
  3398 00001379 53                      		push	bx
  3399 0000137A 0E                      		push	cs
  3400 0000137B E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3401 0000137E 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3402                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3403 00001382 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3404                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3405 00001385 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3406                                  					; only use low part
  3407 00001388 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3408                                  					; control byte modifier
  3409 0000138C 5B                      		pop	bx
  3410 0000138D 07                      		pop	es
  3411                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3412 0000138E 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3413 00001392 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3414 00001395 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3415                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3416 00001397 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3417 0000139B C3                      		retn
  3418                                  
  3419                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3420                                  
  3421                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3422                                  ;
  3423                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3424                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3425                                  ;
  3426                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3427                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3428                                  ;
  3429                                  ;	
  3430                                  ;
  3431                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3432                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3433                                  ;
  3434                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3435                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3436                                  
  3437                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3438 0000139C 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3439 0000139E 0E                      		push	cs
  3440 0000139F E84000                  		call	command
  3441 000013A2 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3442                                  doc1:					
  3443 000013A4 0E                      		push	cs
  3444 000013A5 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3445 000013A8 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3446 000013AA B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3447 000013AD BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3448 000013B0 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3449 000013B1 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3450                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3451                                  
  3452                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3453                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3454                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3455                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3456                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3457                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3458                                  ;
  3459                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3460                                  
  3461                                  rsct_loop:				
  3462 000013B2 6D                      		insw
  3463 000013B3 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3464 000013B5 FB                      		sti
  3465                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3466 000013B6 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3467                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3468                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3469 000013BB 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3470 000013BD 0E                      		push	cs
  3471 000013BE E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3472 000013C1 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3473 000013C3 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3474 000013C6 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3475 000013C9 FA                      		cli
  3476 000013CA F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3477 000013CC FB                      		sti
  3478                                  doc2:					
  3479 000013CD 0E                      		push	cs
  3480 000013CE E82900                  		call	check_status
  3481 000013D1 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3482                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3483 000013D3 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3484 000013D7 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3485                                  doc3:					
  3486 000013D9 C3                      		retn
  3487                                  
  3488                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3489                                  
  3490                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3491                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3492                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3493                                  
  3494                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3495                                  
  3496                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3497                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3498                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3499                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3500                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3501                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3502                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3503                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3504                                  
  3505                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3506                                  ;
  3507                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3508                                  ;
  3509                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3510                                  ;
  3511                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3512                                  ;
  3513                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3514                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3515                                  ;	
  3516                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3517                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3518                                  
  3519                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3520                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3521                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3522                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3523 000013DA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3524 000013DD EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3525                                  
  3526                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3527                                  
  3528                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3529                                  ;
  3530                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3531                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3532                                  ;
  3533                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3534                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3535                                  ;
  3536                                  ;
  3537                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3538                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3539                                  ;
  3540                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3541                                  
  3542                                  command:	; proc near		
  3543                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3544                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3545                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3546 000013E2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3547 000013E5 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3548                                  
  3549                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3550                                  
  3551                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3552                                  ;
  3553                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3554                                  ;
  3555                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3556                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3557                                  ;
  3558                                  ;
  3559                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3560                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3561                                  ;		
  3562                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3563                                  
  3564                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3565                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3566                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3567                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3568 000013EA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3569 000013ED EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3570                                  
  3571                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3572                                  
  3573                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3574                                  ;
  3575                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3576                                  ;
  3577                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3578                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3579                                  ;
  3580                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3581                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3582                                  
  3583                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3584                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3585                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3586                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3587 000013F2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3588 000013F5 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3589                                  
  3590                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3591                                  
  3592                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3593                                  ;
  3594                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3595                                  ;
  3596                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3597                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3598                                  ;
  3599                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3600                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3601                                  
  3602                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3603                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3604                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3605                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3606 000013FA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3607 000013FD EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3608                                  
  3609                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3610                                  
  3611                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3612                                  ;
  3613                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3614                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3615                                  ;
  3616                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3617                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3618                                  ;
  3619                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3620                                  
  3621                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3622                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3623                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3624                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3625 00001402 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3626 00001405 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3627                                  
  3628                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3629                                  
  3630                                  endatrom:
  3631                                  
  3632                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3633                                  
  3634                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3635                                  ;;
  3636                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3637                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3638                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3639                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3640                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3641                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3642                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3643                                  
  3644                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3645 0000140A 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3646                                  					;
  3647                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3648                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3649                                  					;
  3650                                  					; warning!!!
  3651                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3652 0000140D 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3653                                  no_hookit:				
  3654                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3655                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3656 0000140F 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3657                                  
  3658                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3659                                  
  3660                                  mebbe_hookit:				
  3661 00001414 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3662 00001417 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3663 00001419 1E                      		push	ds
  3664 0000141A 50                      		push	ax
  3665 0000141B B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h
  3666 0000141E 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3667 00001420 58                      		pop	ax
  3668 00001421 9C                      		pushf
  3669                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3670                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3671 00001422 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3672 00001427 1F                      		pop	ds
  3673 00001428 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3674                                  
  3675                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3676                                  
  3677 0000142B 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3678                                  
  3679                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3680                                  
  3681                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3682                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3683                                  
  3684                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3685                                  
  3686                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3687                                  ;
  3688                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3689                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3690                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3691                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3692                                  
  3693                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3694 0000142C 2EFF36[F004]            		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3695 00001431 2E813E[F004]891C        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3696                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3697 00001438 730E                    		jnb	short century20
  3698 0000143A 2EC606[F404]13          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3699 00001440 2EC606[F504]50          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3700 00001446 EB13                    		jmp	short years
  3701                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3702                                  		
  3703                                  century20:				
  3704 00001448 2EC606[F404]14          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3705 0000144E 2EC606[F504]00          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3706 00001454 2E812E[F004]891C        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3707                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3708                                  years:					
  3709 0000145B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3710 0000145D 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3711 00001461 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3712                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3713 00001464 F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3714 00001466 2E8916[F004]            		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3715 0000146B B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  3716 0000146D F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3717 0000146F 2E0006[F504]            		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3718 00001474 2EFF06[F004]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3719 00001479 2E813E[F004]6E01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3720 00001480 7626                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3721 00001482 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3722 00001487 2E812E[F004]6E01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3723 0000148E B90300                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3724                                  regularyear:				
  3725 00001491 2E813E[F004]6D01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3726 00001498 7614                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3727 0000149A 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3728 0000149F 2E812E[F004]6D01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3729 000014A6 E2E9                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  3730                                  					;
  3731                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3732                                  leapyear:				
  3733 000014A8 2EC606[F704]1D          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3734                                  					; change month table.
  3735                                  yeardone:				
  3736 000014AE 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  3737 000014B0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3738 000014B2 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3739                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3740 000014B6 BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3741 000014B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12
  3742                                  months:					
  3743 000014BC FEC3                    		inc	bl
  3744                                  
  3745                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3746                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3747                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3748                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3749                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3750                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3751                                  		
  3752 000014BE 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3753 000014C0 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3754                                  					; dh=0
  3755 000014C2 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  3756 000014C4 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  3757 000014C5 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3758 000014C7 E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  3759                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3760                                  month_done:				
  3761 000014C9 2EC606[F704]1C          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3762                                  					; restore month table value
  3763 000014CF 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  3764 000014D1 2E8A36[F504]            		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3765 000014D6 2E8A0E[F404]            		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3766 000014DB 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3767                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3768                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3769 000014E0 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  3770 000014E2 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3771                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3772 000014E7 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  3773 000014E9 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3774                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3775 000014EE 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  3776 000014F0 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3777                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3778 000014F5 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  3779 000014F7 2E8F06[F004]            		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3780 000014FC CB                      		retf
  3781                                  
  3782                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3783                                  
  3784                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3785                                  
  3786                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3787                                  
  3788                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3789                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3790                                  		
  3791 000014FD 51                      		push	cx		
  3792 000014FE D40A                    		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bc
  3793 00001500 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3794 00001502 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3795 00001504 08E0                    		or	al, ah
  3796 00001506 59                      		pop	cx
  3797 00001507 CB                      		retf
  3798                                  
  3799                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3800                                  
  3801                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3802                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3803                                  
  3804                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3805                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3806                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3807                                  
  3808                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3809                                  
  3810                                  int6c:					
  3811 00001508 0E                      		push	cs
  3812 00001509 1F                      		pop	ds
  3813 0000150A 8F06[BB06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3814 0000150E 8F06[BD06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3815 00001512 9D                      		popf
  3816 00001513 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3817 00001516 FA                      		cli
  3818 00001517 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3819 0000151B FB                      		sti
  3820 0000151C E8CB00                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3821 0000151F FA                      		cli
  3822 00001520 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3823 00001522 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3824                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3825                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3826 00001524 FB                      		sti
  3827                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3828                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3829 00001525 FF2E[BB06]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3830                                  
  3831                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3832                                  
  3833                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3834                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3835                                  
  3836                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3837 00001529 50                      		push	ax
  3838 0000152A 51                      		push	cx
  3839 0000152B 52                      		push	dx
  3840 0000152C 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3841 0000152E CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3842                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3843                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3844                                  					; midnight
  3845                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  3846 00001530 5A                      		pop	dx
  3847 00001531 59                      		pop	cx
  3848 00001532 58                      		pop	ax
  3849 00001533 50                      		push	ax
  3850 00001534 53                      		push	bx
  3851 00001535 51                      		push	cx
  3852 00001536 52                      		push	dx
  3853 00001537 2EC706[DB06]0100        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  3854                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  3855 0000153E B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  3856 00001540 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  3857                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  3858                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  3859                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  3860                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  3861 00001542 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  3862 00001544 E99300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  3863                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3864                                  
  3865                                  read_ok:				
  3866 00001547 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  3867 0000154B 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  3868 0000154F 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  3869 00001553 8816[C206]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  3870 00001557 2EC706[DB06]0200        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  3871 0000155E E84201                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  3872 00001561 7277                    		jb	short r_d_ret	;  some	value out of range
  3873 00001563 2EC706[DB06]0300        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  3874 0000156A E8E600                  		call	date_verify
  3875 0000156D 726B                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  3876 0000156F 2EC706[DB06]0000        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  3877 00001576 E8AA00                  		call	in_bin
  3878 00001579 A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  3879 0000157C 98                      		cbw
  3880 0000157D 803E[BF06]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  3881 00001582 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  3882 00001584 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  3883                                  
  3884                                  century_19:				
  3885 00001587 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  3886 0000158A B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  3887 0000158C F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  3888 0000158E 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  3889 00001590 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  3890 00001591 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  3891                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  3892 00001594 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  3893 00001596 2EA3[DB06]              		mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  3894 0000159A 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  3895 0000159C 98                      		cbw
  3896 0000159D 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  3897 0000159F 740C                    		jz	short leap_year
  3898 000015A1 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  3899 000015A4 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  3900 000015A6 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  3901 000015AB EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  3902                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  3903                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3904                                  
  3905                                  leap_year:				
  3906 000015AD 803E[C106]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  3907 000015B2 7605                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  3908                                  leap_adjustment:			
  3909 000015B4 2EFF06[DB06]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  3910                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  3911 000015B9 8A0E[C206]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  3912 000015BD 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  3913 000015BF 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  3914 000015C0 2E010E[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  3915 000015C5 8A0E[C106]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  3916 000015C9 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  3917 000015CB 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  3918 000015CC D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  3919 000015CE BE[C306]                		mov	si, month_table
  3920 000015D1 01CE                    		add	si, cx
  3921                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3922                                  		; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  3923                                  		; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  3924                                  		; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  3925                                  		; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  3926 000015D3 8B04                    		mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  3927                                  					; get #	days in	previous months
  3928 000015D5 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  3929                                  r_d_ret:				
  3930 000015DA 2E8B36[DB06]            		mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  3931 000015DF 5A                      		pop	dx
  3932 000015E0 59                      		pop	cx
  3933 000015E1 5B                      		pop	bx
  3934 000015E2 58                      		pop	ax
  3935 000015E3 C3                      		retn
  3936                                  
  3937                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3938                                  
  3939                                  r_t_retj:				
  3940 000015E4 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  3941 000015E6 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3942 000015E8 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  3943                                  
  3944                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3945                                  
  3946                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  3947                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  3948                                  
  3949                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  3950 000015EA B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  3951 000015EC CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  3952                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  3953                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  3954                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  3955 000015EE 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  3956 000015F0 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  3957 000015F4 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  3958 000015F8 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  3959 000015FC C606[C206]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  3960 00001601 E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  3961 00001604 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  3962 00001606 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  3963 00001609 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  3964 0000160B E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  3965 0000160E 8A2E[BF06]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  3966 00001612 8A0E[C006]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  3967 00001616 8A36[C106]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  3968 0000161A 8A16[C206]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  3969                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3970                                  		; 17/09/2022
  3971                                  		; 31/05/2019
  3972 0000161E FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  3973                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  3974                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  3975                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  3976                                  r_t_ret:				
  3977 00001622 C3                      		retn
  3978                                  
  3979                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  3980                                  
  3981                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  3982                                  
  3983                                  in_bin:		; proc near		
  3984 00001623 A0[BF06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  3985 00001626 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3986 00001629 A2[BF06]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  3987 0000162C A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  3988 0000162F E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3989 00001632 A2[C006]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  3990 00001635 A0[C106]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  3991 00001638 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3992 0000163B A2[C106]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  3993 0000163E A0[C206]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  3994 00001641 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3995 00001644 A2[C206]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  3996 00001647 C3                      		retn
  3997                                  
  3998                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  3999                                  
  4000                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4001                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4002                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4003                                  
  4004                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near		
  4005 00001648 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4006 0000164A 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4007 0000164C B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4008 0000164E D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4009 00001650 D50A                    		aad
  4010 00001652 C3                      		retn
  4011                                  
  4012                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4013                                  
  4014                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4015                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4016                                  
  4017                                  date_verify:	; proc near		
  4018 00001653 803E[BF06]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4019 00001658 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4020 0000165A 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4021 0000165C 803E[BF06]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4022                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4023                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4024 00001661 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4025 00001663 803E[C006]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4026                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4027                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4028 00001668 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4029                                  century_20:				
  4030 0000166A 803E[C006]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4031 0000166F 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4032 00001671 803E[C106]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4033 00001676 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4034 00001678 803E[C106]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4035                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4036 0000167D 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4037 0000167F 803E[C206]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4038 00001684 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4039                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4040                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4041                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4042                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4043                                  		; cf=0
  4044                                  		;clc
  4045                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4046 00001686 803E[C206]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4047 0000168B C3                      		retn
  4048                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4049                                  
  4050                                  date_error:				
  4051 0000168C F9                      		stc
  4052                                  date_err2:
  4053 0000168D C3                      		retn
  4054                                  
  4055                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4056                                  
  4057                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4058                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4059                                  
  4060                                  time_verify:	; proc near		
  4061 0000168E 803E[BF06]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4062 00001693 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4063 00001695 803E[C006]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4064 0000169A 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4065                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4066                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4067                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4068                                  		;clc
  4069                                  		;retn
  4070                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4071 0000169C 803E[C106]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4072                                  time_error:
  4073                                  bv_error:	
  4074 000016A1 F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4075 000016A2 C3                      		retn
  4076                                  
  4077                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4078                                  
  4079                                  ;time_error:				
  4080                                  		;stc
  4081                                  		;retn
  4082                                  
  4083                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4084                                  
  4085                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4086                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4087                                  
  4088                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near		
  4089 000016A3 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4090 000016A6 BB[BF06]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4091                                  bv_loop:				
  4092 000016A9 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4093 000016AB 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4094 000016AD 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4095                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4096 000016B0 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4097 000016B2 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4098 000016B4 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4099 000016B6 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4100 000016B8 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4101 000016BA D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4102 000016BC 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4103 000016BF 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4104 000016C2 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4105 000016C4 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4106 000016C5 49                      		dec	cx
  4107 000016C6 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4108 000016C8 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4109 000016C9 C3                      		retn
  4110                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4111                                  
  4112                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4113                                  ;bv_error:				
  4114                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4115                                  		;retn
  4116                                  
  4117                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4118                                  
  4119                                  endk09:
  4120                                  
  4121                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4122                                  
  4123                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4124                                  ;									:
  4125                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4126                                  ;									:
  4127                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4128                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4129                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4130                                  ;									:
  4131                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4132                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4133                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4134                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4135                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4136                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4137                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4138                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4139                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4140                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4141                                  ;		this program.						:
  4142                                  ;									:
  4143                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4144                                  
  4145                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4146                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4147

  4149

  4162 000016D8 0002                    md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.

  4164 000016DC FFFF                    last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.

  4391                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4392                                  
  4393                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  4394                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  4395                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  4396                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  4397                                  ;
  4398                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  4399                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  4400                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  4401                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  4402                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  4403                                  ;	  and a retf
  4404                                  
  4405                                  ; 16/10/2022
  4406                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  4407                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4408                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  4409                                  
  4410                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  4411                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  4412 00001763 [C800]                  		dw BC_RETF
  4413                                  
  4414                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4415                                  
  4416                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  4417 00001765 2EFF36[6317]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  4418                                  					; set up near return to far return
  4419 0000176A 2EFF36[E006]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  4420 0000176F 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  4421 00001770 CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  4422                                  
  4423                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4424                                  
  4425 00001771 00                      flp_drvs	db 0

  4427                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4428                                  
  4429                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0)
  4430                                  
  4431                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4432                                  ; entry point from boot sector
  4433                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4434                                  
  4435                                  init:		; 27/12/2018
  4436                                  		; MSDOS 6.0 (MSINIT.ASM)
  4437                                  		;=============================================================
  4438                                  		;
  4439                                  		; entry from boot sector. the register contents are:
  4440                                  		;
  4441                                  		;   dl = int 13 drive number we booted from
  4442                                  		;   ch = media byte
  4443                                  		;   bx = first data sector on disk.
  4444                                  		;   ax = first data sector (high)
  4445                                  		;   di = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  4446                                  
  4447                                  		; 07/04/2018
  4448                                  		;=============================================================
  4449                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 - registers from FD Boot Sector 
  4450                                                  ; DL = [bsDriveNumber]
  4451                                  		; DH = [bsMedia]
  4452                                  		; AX = [bsSectors] ; Total sectors
  4453                                  		; DS = 0, SS = 0
  4454                                  		; BP = 7C00h
  4455                                  		
  4456 00001772 FA                      		cli
  4457                                  
  4458                                  		; 21/12/2022
  4459                                  		; ds = 0 (?)
  4460                                  		;push	ax
  4461                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  4462                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  4463                                  		;pop	ax
  4464                                  	
  4465                                  ; 02/10/2022
  4466                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4467                                  ; Note: Retro DOS v4.0 Kernel does not use/contain MSLOAD part of IO.SYS (5.0)
  4468                                  ; 	Because, Retro DOS v2 boot sector loads complete/entire MSDOS.SYS
  4469                                  ;	(RETRODOS.SYS) Kernel file (IO.SYS & MSDOS.SYS together).
  4470                                  ;	As result of boot sector ve init differences, Retro DOS init code (here)
  4471                                  ;	moves kernel to segment 070h at first, then sets diskette parameters
  4472                                  ;	at segment 50h (while MSDOS 5.0 boot sector sets this).
  4473                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4474                                  
  4475                                  ; msload will check the extended boot record and set ax, bx accordingly.
  4476                                  
  4477                                  ;	msload passes a 32 bit sector number hi word in ax and low in bx
  4478                                  ;	save this in cs:bios_h and cs:bios_l. this is for the start of
  4479                                  ;	data sector of the bios.
  4480                                  
  4481 00001773 2EA3[CE16]              		mov	[cs:bios_h], ax	; (start of) dos bios (IO.SYS) data sector
  4482 00001777 2E891E[CC16]            		mov	[cs:bios_l], bx
  4483                                  
  4484                                  ; with the following information from msload, we don't need the
  4485                                  ;     boot sector any more.-> this will solve the problem of 29 kb size
  4486                                  ;     limitation of msbio.com file.
  4487                                  
  4488 0000177C 0E                      		push	cs		; Save a peck of interrupt vectors...
  4489 0000177D 07                      		pop	es
  4490 0000177E 51                      		push	cx
  4491 0000177F 57                      		push	di
  4492                                  
  4493                                  		; 21/12/2022
  4494                                  		; ds = 0 (?)
  4495                                  		; 24/12/2022
  4496                                  		; ds = cs
  4497 00001780 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4498 00001782 8ED9                    		mov	ds, cx
  4499                                  		; ds = 0
  4500                                  
  4501 00001784 B105                    		mov	cl, 5
  4502                                  		;mov	cx, 5		; NUMROMVECTORS
  4503                                  					; no. of rom vectors to	be saved
  4504                                  		;mov	si, offset RomVectors ; point to list of int vectors
  4505 00001786 BE[0001]                		mov	si, RomVectors
  4506                                  next_int_:		
  4507 00001789 2E                      		cs	; 16/10/2022
  4508 0000178A AC                      		lodsb		
  4509                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si] ; cs lodsb
  4510 0000178B 98                      		cbw			; ax = interrupt number
  4511 0000178C D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  4512 0000178E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; int no * 4
  4513 00001790 89C7                    		mov	di, ax		; interrupt vector address
  4514 00001792 87F7                    		xchg	si, di		; rombios interrupt vector address in si
  4515                                  					; saving address in di
  4516 00001794 AD                      		lodsw			; movsw
  4517 00001795 AB                      		stosw
  4518 00001796 AD                      		lodsw			; movsw
  4519 00001797 AB                      		stosw			; save the vector
  4520 00001798 87F7                    		xchg	si, di
  4521 0000179A E2ED                    		loop	next_int_
  4522 0000179C 5F                      		pop	di
  4523 0000179D 59                      		pop	cx
  4524                                  
  4525                                  ; we need to save int13 in two places in case we are running on an at.
  4526                                  ; on ats we install the ibm supplied rom_bios patch which hooks
  4527                                  ; int13 ahead of orig13. since int19 must unhook int13 to point to the
  4528                                  ; rom int13 routine, we must have that rom address also stored away.
  4529                                  
  4530                                  		; 21/12/2022
  4531                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:Old13]	; save old13 in orig13 also
  4532                                  		;mov	[cs:Orig13], ax
  4533                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:Old13+2]
  4534                                  		;mov	[cs:Orig13+2], ax
  4535                                  
  4536                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4537 0000179E C7064C00[7407]          		mov	word [13h*4], block13
  4538                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:4Ch, offset	block13	; 13h*4
  4539                                  					; set up int 13	for new	action
  4540 000017A4 8C0E4E00                		mov	[13h*4+2], cs
  4541                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:4Eh, cs ; 13h*4+2
  4542 000017A8 C7065400[4808]          		mov	word [15h*4], Int15
  4543                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:54h, offset	Int15 ;	15h*4
  4544                                  					; set up int 15	for new	action
  4545 000017AE 8C0E5600                		mov	[15h*4+2], cs
  4546                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:56h, cs ; 15h*4+2
  4547 000017B2 C7066400[F907]          		mov	word [19h*4], int19
  4548                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:64h, offset	int19 ;	19h*4
  4549                                  					; set up int 19	for new	action
  4550 000017B8 8C0E6600                		mov	[19h*4+2], cs
