  9982                                  
  9983                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9984                                  
  9985                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9986                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
  9987                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
  9988                                  ;
  9989                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
  9990                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9991                                  
  9992                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9993                                  
  9994                                  readbootsec:	
  9995 000006B1 B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
  9996 000006B3 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
  9997 000006B6 E8BF00                  		call	read_sector
  9998 000006B9 7243                    		jb	short err_ret
  9999 000006BB 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
 10000                                  
 10001                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
 10002                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
 10003                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
 10004                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
 10005                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
 10006                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
 10007                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
 10008                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
 10009                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
 10010                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
 10011                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
 10012                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
 10013                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
 10014                                  		; informations
 10015                                  
 10016                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
 10017                                  
 10018                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10019                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10020                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
 10021                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
 10022                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
 10023                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
 10024                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
 10025                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10026                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10027                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10028                                  
 10029                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10030 000006BD A0[4E01]                		mov	al, [disksector]
 10031 000006C0 3C69                    		cmp	al, 69h		; is it a direct jump?
 10032 000006C2 740F                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10033                                  					; don't need to find a nop
 10034 000006C4 3CE9                    		cmp	al, 0E9h	; dos 2.0 jump?
 10035 000006C6 740B                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10036                                  					; no need for nop
 10037 000006C8 3CEB                    		cmp	al, 0EBh	; how about a short jump?
 10038 000006CA 7530                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10039 000006CC 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10040 000006D1 7529                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10041                                  
 10042                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10043                                  ;
 10044                                  ;; 10/03/2019
 10045                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
 10046                                  ;;
 10047                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
 10048                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
 10049                                  ;;
 10050                                  ;;check_signature:
 10051                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
 10052                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
 10053                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if single sided medium.
 10054                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
 10055                                  
 10056                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
 10057                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
 10058                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 10059                                  
 10060                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10061                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
 10062 000006D3 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10063                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10064 000006D6 50                      		push	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10065 000006D7 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 10066 000006D9 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 10067 000006DB 58                      		pop	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10068 000006DC 751E                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10069                                  
 10070                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 10071                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 10072                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 10073                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 10074                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 10075                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 10076                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 10077                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 10078                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 10079                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 10080                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 10081                                  
 10082                                  checksinglesided:
 10083                                  		;mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10084                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10085                                  		; al = [disksector+15h]
 10086 000006DE 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 10087 000006E0 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 10088 000006E2 A801                    		test	al, 1
 10089 000006E4 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 10090 000006E6 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 10091 000006EC 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 10092 000006EE 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 10093 000006F3 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 10094                                  
 10095                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 10096                                  
 10097                                  mustbeearlier:				
 10098 000006F5 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 10099                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10100 000006FA EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk

 10118                                  
 10119                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10120                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10121                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 10122                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 10123                                  ;
 10124                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 10125                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 10126                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 10127                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 10128                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 10129                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 10130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10131                                  
 10132                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10133                                  
 10134                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10135                                  movbpb:

 10138                                  					; sectors per unit
 10139 00000703 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 10140                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 10141                                  					; number of directory entries
 10142 00000707 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 10143                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 10144                                  					; size of drive
 10145 0000070B 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 10146                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10147                                  					; media	descriptor
 10148 0000070F A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 10149                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 10150                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 10151 00000712 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 10152                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 10153                                  					; sectors per track
 10154 00000716 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 10155                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 10156                                  					; number of heads
 10157 0000071A 803E[0A05]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?

 10172                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10173                                  
 10174                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 10175                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 10176                                  ;by es:di.
 10177                                  
 10178                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 10179                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 10180                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 10181                                  ;      the boot record information.
 10182                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 10183                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 10184                                  
 10185                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10186                                  mov_media_ids:		
 10187 00000736 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 10188                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 10189                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 10190 0000073B 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
 10191 0000073D 51                      		push	cx
 10192 0000073E 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
 10193                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 10194 00000742 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 10195 00000746 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 10196                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 10197 0000074A 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 10198 0000074E 57                      		push	di
 10199 0000074F 56                      		push	si
 10200 00000750 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10201 00000753 BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
 10202                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
 10203                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL
 10204 00000756 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 10205 00000759 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10206                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 10207                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10208 0000075B B108                    		mov	cl, 8 ; cx = 8
 10209 0000075D BE[8401]                		mov	si, disksector+36h
 10210                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID
 10211 00000760 83C705                  		add	di, 5		; (BDS.filesys_id-BDS.volid)-size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10212 00000763 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10213 00000765 5E                      		pop	si
 10214 00000766 5F                      		pop	di
 10215 00000767 59                      		pop	cx
 10216                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10217                                  		; cf = 0
 10218                                  		;clc		; this clc is not required (16/06/2019 - Erdogan Tan)
 10219                                  				; (20/09/2022)
 10220 00000768 C3                      		retn

 10223                                  mmi_not_ext:				
 10224 00000769 F9                      		stc
 10225 0000076A C3                      		retn

 10227                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10228                                  
 10229                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10230                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10231                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10232                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10233                                  ; output:
 10234                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10235                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 10236                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10237                                  
 10238                                  readfat:	
 10239                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10240                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10241 0000076B 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10242 0000076D B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10243                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 10244 00000770 E80500                  		call	read_sector
 10245 00000773 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10246 00000775 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 10247                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 10248 00000777 C3                      		retn
 10249                                  
 10250                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10251                                  
 10252                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10253                                  
 10254                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10255                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10256                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10257                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10258                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10259                                  ;		dh has head
 10260                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10261                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10262                                  ;
 10263                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10264                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10265                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10266                                  ;
 10267                                  ;		carry set
 10268                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10269                                  ;
 10270                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10271                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10272                                  
 10273                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10274                                  
 10275                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10276                                  read_sector:	
 10277 00000778 55                      		push	bp
 10278 00000779 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10279 0000077C 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10280 00000780 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10281                                  rd_ret:					
 10282 00000783 06                      		push	es
 10283 00000784 1E                      		push	ds
 10284 00000785 07                      		pop	es
 10285 00000786 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10286 00000789 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10287                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10288                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10289                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10290 0000078B 07                      		pop	es
 10291 0000078C 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10292                                  rd_rty:					
 10293 0000078E E87404                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10294 00000791 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10295 00000793 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10296                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10297                                  					; fnon_removable
 10298 00000798 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10299 0000079A 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10300 0000079F 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10301 000007A1 50                      		push	ax
 10302 000007A2 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10303 000007A3 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10304                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10305                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10306                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10307                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10308 000007A7 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10309 000007A9 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10310                                  		; 
 10311 000007AC 1F                      		pop	ds
 10312 000007AD A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10313 000007B0 58                      		pop	ax
 10314                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10315 000007B1 06                      		push	es
 10316 000007B2 1E                      		push	ds
 10317 000007B3 07                      		pop	es
 10318 000007B4 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10319 000007B7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10320                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10321                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10322                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10323 000007B9 07                      		pop	es
 10324 000007BA 9C                      		pushf
 10325 000007BB 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10326 000007C0 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 10327 000007C2 50                      		push	ax
 10328 000007C3 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 10329 000007C6 1E                      		push	ds
 10330 000007C7 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10331 000007CB 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10332 000007CE 1F                      		pop	ds
 10333 000007CF 58                      		pop	ax
 10334                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 10335 000007D0 9D                      		popf
 10336 000007D1 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 10337 000007D3 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 10338                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10339                                  
 10340                                  err_rd_ret:				
 10341 000007D5 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 10342                                  					; return error
 10343 000007D7 F9                      		stc
 10344                                  
 10345                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 10346                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 10347                                  
 10348                                  okret2:					
 10349 000007D8 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 10350 000007DC 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 10351 000007E0 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10352                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive

 10356 000007E8 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 10357 000007E9 5D                      		pop	bp
 10358 000007EA C3                      		retn

 10381 00000804 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 10382 00000809 7404                    		jz	short exitjx	; watch	out for	wrap
 10383 0000080B 26FF4D20                		dec	word [es:di+20h]
 10384                                  exitjx:					
 10385                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10386                                  		; cf = 0
 10387                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10388                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 10389 0000080F C3                      		retn

 10448                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

 10450                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10451                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10452                                  
 10453                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10454                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10455                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10456                                  
 10457                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10458                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10459                                  ;
 10460                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10461                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10462                                  
 10463                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10464                                  checksingle:		
 10465 0000083A 50                      		push	ax
 10466 0000083B 53                      		push	bx
 10467 0000083C 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10468                                  
 10469                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10470                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10471                                  
 10472 00000840 F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10473 00000843 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10474 00000845 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10475                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10476 00000848 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10477                                  
 10478                                  
 10479                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10480                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10481                                  
 10482 0000084A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10483                                  					; get physical drive number
 10484 0000084E 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10485 0000084F 57                      		push	di
 10486 00000850 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10487                                  scan_list:				
 10488 00000854 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10489 00000858 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10490 0000085A B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10491 0000085C 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10492 00000860 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10493 00000862 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10494 00000866 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10495 00000867 07                      		pop	es
 10496 00000868 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10497                                  
 10498                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10499                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10500                                  ; in this case.
 10501 0000086C 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10502 00000871 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10503                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10504 00000873 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10505 00000878 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10506 0000087A 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10507                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10508                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10509 0000087E 06                      		push	es
 10510 0000087F 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10511 00000883 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 10512                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10513                                  					; set up sdsb
 10514 00000887 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 10515 00000888 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 10516                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10517                                  
 10518                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10519                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10520                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10521                                  
 10522                                  not_fsetowner:				
 10523 0000088A 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
 10524 0000088F 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 10525 00000891 50                      		push	ax
 10526 00000892 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 10527 00000896 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10528 00000898 06                      		push	es
 10529 00000899 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10530 0000089D 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 10531                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10532                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10533 000008A2 07                      		pop	es
 10534 000008A3 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 10535 000008A5 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10536 000008A6 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 10537                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 10538 000008A8 E85C0E                  		call	swpdsk
 10539 000008AB EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 10540                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10541                                  
 10542                                  scan_skip:	
 10543 000008AD 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
 10544                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 10545                                  					; go to	next bds
 10546 000008B0 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 10547 000008B3 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 10548 000008B5 F9                      		stc

 10550 000008B7 07                      		pop	es
 10551

 10573                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10574                                  
 10575                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10576                                  
 10577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10578                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10579                                  ;
 10580                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10581                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10582                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10583                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10584                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10585                                  ;	ds = cs
 10586                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10587                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10588                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10589                                  ;
 10590                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10591                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10592                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10593                                  
 10594                                  diskrd:	
 10595                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10596                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10597 000008C3 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10598                                  
 10599                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10600                                  
 10601                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10602                                  diskio:
 10603 000008C8 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10604 000008CA 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10605 000008CE E8FAFB                  		call	SetDrive
 10606 000008D1 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10607 000008D5 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10608                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10609 000008D8 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10610                                  
 10611                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10612                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10613                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10614                                  
 10615 000008DA 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10616                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10617                                  					; unformatted_media
 10618 000008DF 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10619 000008E1 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10620 000008E5 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10621

 11048                                  
 11049                                  doverify:				
 11050 00000B1D 58                      		pop	ax
 11051 00000B1E 50                      		push	ax
 11052 00000B1F B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11053 00000B21 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 11054 00000B24 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11055                                  
 11056                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11057                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11058                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11059                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11060                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11061                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11062                                  
 11063 00000B26 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11064 00000B29 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11065 00000B2B FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11066 00000B2F 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11067 00000B31 E83705                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11068 00000B34 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11069                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11070                                  
 11071                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11072 00000B36 E83205                  		call	ResetDisk
 11073 00000B39 FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11074 00000B3D EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11075                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11076                                  
 11077                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11078                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11079                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11080                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11081                                  
 11082                                  dskerr:					
 11083 00000B3F 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11084 00000B44 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11085 00000B46 E8FE0C                  		call	checkio
 11086                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11087 00000B49 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11088 00000B4E 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11089 00000B50 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11090 00000B53 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11091                                  dochkagain:				
 11092 00000B58 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11093                                  dskerr0:				
 11094 00000B5B 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11095 00000B5D 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11096                                  					; fnon_removable
 11097 00000B62 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11098 00000B64 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11099 00000B67 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11100                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11101 00000B69 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11102 00000B6C 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11103 00000B6E C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11104                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11105                                  dskerr1:				
 11106 00000B74 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11107                                  		;jmp	retry
 11108                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11109 00000B75 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11110                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11111                                  
 11112                                  write_fault_err:			
 11113 00000B78 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11114                                  					; for write fault error.
 11115 00000B7B EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11116                                  
 11117                                  		; fall into harderr
 11118                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11119                                  
 11120                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11121                                  
 11122                                  harderr:				
 11123 00000B7D E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11124                                  harderr2:				
 11125 00000B80 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11126                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11127 00000B85 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11128 00000B89 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11129                                  
 11130                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11131                                  
 11132                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11133                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11134 00000B8D E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11135                                  
 11136                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11137                                  
 11138                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11139                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11140                                  
 11141                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11142                                  normspeed:
 11143 00000B90 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11144 00000B95 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11145 00000B97 06                      		push	es
 11146 00000B98 50                      		push	ax
 11147 00000B99 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11148 00000B9C C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11149 00000BA0 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11150 00000BA4 58                      		pop	ax
 11151 00000BA5 07                      		pop	es
 11152 00000BA6 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11153 00000BA9 06                      		push	es
 11154 00000BAA C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11155 00000BAE 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11156                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11157 00000BB3 07                      		pop	es
 11158 00000BB4 C3                      		retn
 11159                                  
 11160                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11161                                  
 11162                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11163                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11164                                  
 11165                                  fastspeed:		
 11166 00000BB5 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11167                                  					; ftoobig
 11168 00000BBA 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11169 00000BBC 06                      		push	es
 11170 00000BBD 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11171 00000BC1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11172 00000BC3 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11173 00000BC7 07                      		pop	es
 11174 00000BC8 C3                      		retn
 11175                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11176                                  
 11177                                  notready:				
 11178 00000BC9 F9                      		stc
 11179 00000BCA B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11180 00000BCC C3                      		retn
 11181                                  
 11182                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11183                                  
 11184                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11185                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11186                                  
 11187                                  maperror:	
 11188 00000BCD 51                      		push	cx
 11189 00000BCE 06                      		push	es
 11190 00000BCF 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11191 00000BD0 07                      		pop	es
 11192 00000BD1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11193 00000BD3 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11194 00000BD6 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11195                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11196 00000BD9 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11197 00000BDC F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11198                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11199 00000BDE 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11200                                  					; get translation
 11201                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11202                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11203 00000BE1 07                      		pop	es
 11204 00000BE2 59                      		pop	cx
 11205 00000BE3 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11206 00000BE4 C3                      		retn
 11207                                  
 11208                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11209                                  
 11210                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11211                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11212                                  
 11213                                  set_tim:		
 11214 00000BE5 50                      		push	ax
 11215 00000BE6 E891F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11216                                  
 11217                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11218                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11219                                  
 11220 00000BE9 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11221 00000BED 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11222 00000BEF 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11223                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11224                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11225 00000BF3 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11226                                  setaccess:				
 11227 00000BF5 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11228 00000BFA 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11229 00000BFE 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11230                                  done_set:				
 11231 00000C02 F8                      		clc
 11232                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11233 00000C03 58                      		pop	ax
 11234 00000C04 C3                      		retn
 11235                                  
 11236                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11237                                  
 11238                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11239                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11240                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11241                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11242                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11243                                  
 11244                                  again:	
 11245 00000C05 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11246 00000C08 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11247 00000C0B 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11248                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11249 00000C0D 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11250 00000C0E C3                      		retn
 11251                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11252                                  
 11253                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11254 00000C0F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11255 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 11256

 11267                                  ;
 11268                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11269                                  ;
 11270                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11271                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11272                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11273                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11274                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11275                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11276                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11277                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11278                                  ; ==========================================================================

 11281

 11285 00000C12 00                      		db 0
 11286

 11290                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11291                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11292                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11293                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 11294                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11295                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 11298                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function

 11300

 11302                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11303                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11304                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11305                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11306                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 11309                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11310

 11361                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11362                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11363                                  ;
 11364                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11365                                  ;
 11366                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11367                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11368                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11369                                  ;
 11370                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11371                                  
 11372                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11373                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11374                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11375 00000C42 E886F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11376 00000C45 06                      		push	es
 11377 00000C46 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11378 00000C4A 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11379                                  					; RAWIO
 11380 00000C4F 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11381 00000C53 07                      		pop	es
 11382 00000C54 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11383                                  
 11384                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11385                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11386                                  
 11387                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11388 00000C56 BE[130C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11389                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11390                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11391 00000C59 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11392 00000C5B 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11393                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11394 00000C5D BE[260C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11395                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11396                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11397                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11398 00000C60 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11399 00000C62 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11400 00000C64 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11401 00000C67 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11402 00000C69 98                      		cbw
 11403 00000C6A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11404 00000C6C 46                      		inc	si
 11405 00000C6D 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11406 00000C6F 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11407                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11408 00000C72 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11409                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11410                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11411 00000C77 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11412 00000C79 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11413                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11414                                  
 11415                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11416                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11417                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11418 00000C7A 5A                      		pop	dx
 11419                                  
 11420                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11421 00000C7B E957F4                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11422                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11423                                  
 11424                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11425                                  
 11426                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11427                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11428                                  ;
 11429                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11430                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11431                                  ;
 11432                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11433                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11434                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11435                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11436                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11437                                  
 11438                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11439                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11440                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11441                                  
 11442 00000C7E C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11443 00000C82 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11444                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11445 00000C85 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11446 00000C89 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11447 00000C8C 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11448 00000C90 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11449                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11450 00000C93 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11451 00000C96 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11452 00000C9A 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11453 00000C9D 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11454 00000C9F 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11455                                  					
 11456                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11457 00000CA2 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11458 00000CA5 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11459                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11460 00000CA8 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11461 00000CAA 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11462 00000CAB 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11463                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11464                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11465                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11466 00000CB0 E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11467 00000CB3 E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11468 00000CB6 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11469 00000CB7 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11470 00000CB9 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11471                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11472                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11473 00000CBC 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]

 11659                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11660                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11661                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11662                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11663                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11664                                  ;
 11665                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11666                                  ;
 11667                                  ; output:
 11668                                  ;	for status call:
 11669                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11670                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11671                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11672                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11673                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11674                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11675                                  ;
 11676                                  ;	for format track:
 11677                                  ;		carry set if error
 11678                                  ;
 11679                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11680                                  
 11681                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11682

 11833                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11834                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11835                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11836                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11837                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to

 11948                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11949                                  
 11950                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11951                                  ;
 11952                                  ; TrackIo:
 11953                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11954                                  ;
 11955                                  ;   input:
 11956                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11957                                  ;		  3 = write
 11958                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11959                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11960                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11961                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11962                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11963                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11964                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11965                                  ;
 11966                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11967                                  
 11968                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 12203                                  
 12204                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12205                                  
 12206                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12207                                  ;
 12208                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12209                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12210                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12211                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12212                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12213                                  ;
 12214                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12215                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12216                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12217                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12218                                  ;
 12219                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12220                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12221                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12222                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12223                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12224                                  ;
 12225                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12226                                  
 12227                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12228                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12229 00000FD7 51                      		push	cx
 12230 00000FD8 52                      		push	dx
 12231                                  
 12232                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12233                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12234                                  
 12235 00000FD9 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12236 00000FDE 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12237 00000FE0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12238 00000FE2 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12239 00000FE7 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12240 00000FE9 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12241                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12242

 12279                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track

 12339                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12340                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.

 12364                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12365                                  ;
 12366                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12367                                  ;
 12368                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12369                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12370                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12371                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12372                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12373                                  ;

 12382                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 12386                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.

 12391 00001078 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12392                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12393 0000107A C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12394                                  					; Zap up the speed

 12402                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12403                                  ;
 12404                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12405                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12406                                  ;
 12407                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12408                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12409                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12410                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12411                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12412                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12413                                  ;
 12414                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12415                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12416                                  ;
 12417                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12476                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12477                                  ;
 12478                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12479                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12480                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12481                                  ;
 12482                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12484                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12485                                  ioctl_getown:
 12486 000010D9 E8EFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12487 000010DC 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12488                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12489 000010E0 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12490                                  ownloop:				
 12491 000010E4 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12492 000010E8 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12493                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12494 000010EA 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12495                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12496                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12497 000010EF 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12498                                  getnextBDS:				
 12499 000010F1 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12500 000010F4 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12501                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12502                                  
 12503                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12504                                  ;
 12505                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12506                                  ; in al to al.

 12518                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12519                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12520                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn

 12525                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.

 12543                                  					; Exit normal termination

 12545                                  		; cf=0
 12546                                  		;clc
