 14449                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14450                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14451                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14452                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14453                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14454                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14455                                  
 14456                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14457 00001749 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14458 0000174B 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14458 00001754 736B6574746520666F-
 14458 0000175D 7220647269766520   
 14459                                  
 14460                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14461 00001765 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14461 0000176E 65737320616E79206B-
 14461 00001777 6579207768656E2072-
 14461 00001780 656164790D0A       
 14462 00001786 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14463                                  
 14464                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14465                                  
 14466                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14467                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14468                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14469                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14470                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14471                                  
 14472                                  chkopcnt:		
 14473 00001788 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14474 0000178D C3                      		retn
 14475                                  
 14476                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14477                                  
 14478                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14479                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14480                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14481                                  ;
 14482                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14483                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14484                                  
 14485                                  mediacheck:	
 14486 0000178E E8A9F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14487 00001791 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14488 00001793 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14489 00001796 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14490 00001798 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14491 0000179B 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14492 0000179D 50                      		push	ax
 14493 0000179E 52                      		push	dx
 14494 0000179F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14495                                  					; set logical drive number
 14496 000017A3 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14497 000017A5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14498                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14499                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14500 000017A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 14501 000017A8 58                      		pop	ax
 14502 000017A9 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14503 000017AB BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14504                                  
 14505                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14506                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14507                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14508                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14509                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14510                                  ; status.
 14511                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14512 000017AE 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14513 000017B2 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14514                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14515                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14516                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14517                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14518 000017B6 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14519                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14520                                  
 14521                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14522                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14523                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14524                                  
 14525 000017B8 50                      		push	ax
 14526 000017B9 51                      		push	cx
 14527 000017BA 52                      		push	dx
 14528 000017BB E895ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14529 000017BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14530 000017BF 59                      		pop	cx
 14531 000017C0 58                      		pop	ax
 14532 000017C1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14533 000017C3 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14534                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14535 000017C5 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14536                                  mediaret:				
 14537 000017C7 C3                      		retn
 14538                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14539                                  
 14540                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14541                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14542                                  ; or write.
 14543                                  
 14544                                  mediadovolid:				
 14545 000017C8 E82DEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14546 000017CB 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14547 000017CD E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14548 000017D0 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14549 000017D2 E9F8F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14550                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14551                                  
 14552                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14553                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14554                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14555                                  ; dos.
 14556                                  ;
 14557                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14558                                  
 14559                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14560                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14561                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14562                                  
 14563                                  checklatchio:	
 14564                                  
 14565                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14566                                  			
 14567 000017D5 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14568 000017D8 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14569                                  
 14570                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14571                                  
 14572 000017DA E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14573 000017DD 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14574                                  
 14575                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14576                                  ; expensive verification.
 14577                                  
 14578 000017DF E816EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14579 000017E2 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14580 000017E4 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14581 000017E7 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14582 000017E9 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14583 000017EB 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14584 000017ED E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14585                                  checklatchret:				
 14586 000017F0 E8DAF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14587                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14588 000017F3 F9                      		stc
 14589 000017F4 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14590                                  checkret:				
 14591 000017F5 C3                      		retn
 14592                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14593                                  
 14594                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14595                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14596                                  ;
 14597                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14598                                  
 14599                                  checkfatvid:				
 14600 000017F6 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14601 000017F9 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14602 000017FB 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14603                                  
 14604                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14605                                  
 14606                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14607                                  
 14608                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14609                                  
 14610                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14611                                  ;
 14612                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14613                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14614                                  ;
 14615                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14616                                  ;
 14617                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14618                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14619                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14620                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14621                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14622                                  ;
 14623                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14624                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14625                                  ; routine.)
 14626                                  ;
 14627                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14628                                  
 14629                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14630                                  check_vid:
 14631                                  
 14632                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14633                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14634                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14635                                  
 14636 000017FD 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14637                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14638                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14639 00001802 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14640 00001804 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14641 00001807 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14642 00001809 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14643 0000180B 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14644                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14645 00001810 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14646                                  					; if not fat system
 14647 00001812 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14648 00001815 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14649 00001817 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14650 0000181A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14651                                  					; definitely changed
 14652 0000181D 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14653                                  
 14654 0000181F 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14655                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14656 00001820 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14657                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14658                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14659                                  		;clc
 14660                                  checkfatret:				
 14661 00001823 C3                      		retn
 14662                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14663                                  
 14664                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14665                                  changed_drv:
 14666 00001824 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14667 00001825 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14668                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14669 0000182A C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14670                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14671                                  
 14672                                  ; extended id check
 14673                                  
 14674                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14675                                  
 14676                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14677                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14678                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14679                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14680                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14681                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14682                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14683                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14684                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14685                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14686                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14687                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14688                                  ;
 14689                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14690                                  
 14691                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14692                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14693 0000182B 50                      		push	ax
 14694                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14695                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14696 0000182C A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14697                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14698 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14699 00001831 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14700 00001835 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14701 00001837 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14702 0000183A 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14703 0000183E 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14704                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14705                                  					; don't know
 14706 00001840 58                      		pop	ax
 14707 00001841 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14708                                  					; reset the flag
 14709                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14710                                  
 14711                                  ext_changed:
 14712 00001843 58                      		pop	ax
 14713                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14714 00001844 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 14715                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14716                                  					; disk changed!
 14717                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14718                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14719                                  		;clc
 14720 00001845 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14721                                  
 14722                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14723                                  
 14724                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14725                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14726                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14727                                  ;
 14728                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14729                                  
 14730                                  checkio:				
 14731 00001847 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14732 0000184A 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14733 0000184C E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14734 0000184F 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14735 00001851 E8A4ED                  		call	GetBp
 14736 00001854 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14737 00001856 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14738 00001859 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14739 0000185B 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14740 0000185D 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14741 0000185F 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14742 00001860 C3                      		retn
 14743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14744                                  
 14745                                  checkioerr:				
 14746 00001861 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14747                                  
 14748                                  checkioret:				
 14749 00001864 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14750 00001865 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr
 14751                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14752                                  
 14753                                  no_error_map:				
 14754 00001868 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 14755                                  
 14756                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14757                                  
 14758                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14759                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14760                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14761                                  
 14762                                  returnvid:		
 14763 0000186B BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14764                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14765 0000186E E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14766 00001871 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14767 00001873 F9                      		stc
 14768 00001874 C3                      		retn
 14769                                  
 14770                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14771                                  
 14772                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14773                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14774                                  ;
 14775                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14776                                  ; **trashes si**
 14777                                  
 14778                                  media_set_vid:				
 14779 00001875 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14780                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14781                                  
 14782                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14783                                  
 14784                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14785                                  
 14786                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14787                                  
 14788                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14789                                  vid_into_packet:
 14790 00001878 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14791 00001879 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14792 0000187D 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14793 00001880 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14794 00001882 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14795 00001885 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14796 00001888 1F                      		pop	ds
 14797                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14798 00001889 C3                      		retn
 14799                                  
 14800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14801                                  
 14802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14803                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14804                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14805                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14806                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14807                                  ;
 14808                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14809                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14810                                  ;
 14811                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14812                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14813                                  ;		carry set
 14814                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14815                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14816                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14817                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14818                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14819                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14820                                  ;
 14821                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14822                                  
 14823                                  hidensity:
 14824                                  
 14825                                  ; check for correct drive
 14826                                  		
 14827                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14828 0000188A 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14829                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14830                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14831 0000188F 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14832                                  
 14833                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14834                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14835                                  
 14836 00001891 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14837 00001896 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14838                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14839                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14840 00001898 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14841 0000189B 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14842                                  
 14843                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14844                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14845                                  
 14846                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14847 0000189D 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14848 000018A1 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 14849                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14850                                  					; ffOther
 14851 000018A3 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 14852 000018A5 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 14853                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14854                                  					; ff288
 14855 000018A7 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 14856 000018A9 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14857 000018AB BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14858                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14859                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14860 000018AE B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14861                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14862                                  					; 2 sides
 14863                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14864 000018B1 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 14865 000018B2 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14866                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14867                                  					; & head max
 14868                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14869 000018B5 E9B2ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14870                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14871                                  
 14872                                  Is720K:
 14873                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14874 000018B8 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 14875                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14876 000018B9 E975ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14877                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14878                                  
 14879                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14880                                  ;dofloppy:
 14881                                  		;retn
 14882                                  
 14883                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14884                                  
 14885                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14886                                  
 14887                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14888                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14889                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14890                                  ;
 14891                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14892                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14893                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14894                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14895                                  ;
 14896                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14897                                  ;
 14898                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14899                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14900                                  
 14901                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14902 000018BC 06                      		push	es
 14903 000018BD 57                      		push	di
 14904                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14905                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14906 000018BE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14907                                  
 14908                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14909                                  
 14910                                  scan_bds:				
 14911 000018C2 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14912 000018C6 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14913                                  
 14914                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14915                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14916                                  
 14917 000018C8 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14918                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14919                                  get_next_bds:				
 14920 000018CC 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14921                                  					; go to	next bds
 14922 000018CF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14923 000018D2 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14924 000018D4 5F                      		pop	di
 14925 000018D5 07                      		pop	es
 14926 000018D6 C3                      		retn
 14927                                  
 14928                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14929                                  
 14930                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14931                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14932                                  ;
 14933                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14934                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14935                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14936                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14937                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14938                                  
 14939                                  checkromchange:	
 14940                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14941                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14942 000018D7 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14943                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14944                                  					; fchanged
 14945 000018DC C3                      		retn
 14946                                  
 14947                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14948                                  
 14949                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14950                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14951                                  ;
 14952                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14953                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14954                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14955                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14956                                  
 14957                                  resetchanged:	
 14958                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14959                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14960 000018DD 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14961                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14962                                  					; ~fchanged
 14963 000018E2 C3                      		retn
 14964                                  
 14965                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14966                                  
 14967                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14968                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14969                                  ;
 14970                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14971                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14972                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14973                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14974                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14975                                  
 14976                                  haschange:
 14977                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14978                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14979 000018E3 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14980                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14981                                  					; fchangeline
 14982 000018E8 C3                      		retn
 14983                                  
 14984                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14985                                  
 14986                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14987                                  
 14988                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14989                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14990                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14991                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14992                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14993                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14994                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14995                                  
 14996                                  ; set_volume_id
 14997                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14998                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14999                                  ;
 15000                                  ;   on entry:
 15001                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15002                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15003                                  ;
 15004                                  ;   on exit:
 15005                                  ;	carry clear:
 15006                                  ;	   successful call
 15007                                  ;	carry set
 15008                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15009                                  
 15010                                  set_volume_id:				
 15011 000018E9 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15012 000018EA 50                      		push	ax
 15013 000018EB E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15014 000018EE 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15015 000018F0 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15016 000018F3 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15017 000018F5 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15018 000018F8 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15019                                  setvret:				
 15020                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15021                                  		; cf = 0
 15022                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15023 000018FB 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15024 000018FC 5A                      		pop	dx
 15025 000018FD C3                      		retn
 15026                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15027                                  
 15028                                  seterr:					
 15029 000018FE 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15030 000018FF 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15031 00001900 C3                      		retn
 15032                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15033 00001901 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15034                                  
 15035                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15036                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15037                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15038                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15039                                  
 15040                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15041                                  
 15042                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15043                                  
 15044                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15045                                  ;
 15046                                  ;   on entry:
 15047                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15048                                  ;
 15049                                  ;   on exit:
 15050                                  ;	carry clear
 15051                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15052                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15053                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15054                                  ;
 15055                                  ;	carry set:
 15056                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15057                                  
 15058                                  read_volume_id:
 15059 00001903 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15060 00001904 51                      		push	cx
 15061 00001905 53                      		push	bx
 15062 00001906 50                      		push	ax
 15063 00001907 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15064 00001908 57                      		push	di
 15065 00001909 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15066 0000190A 07                      		pop	es
 15067 0000190B BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15068 0000190E BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15069 00001911 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15070 00001914 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15071 00001916 5F                      		pop	di
 15072 00001917 07                      		pop	es
 15073 00001918 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15074                                  					; # of fats
 15075 0000191C 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15076                                  					; sectors / fat
 15077 00001920 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15078 00001922 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15079                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15080                                  					;
 15081                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15082                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15083 00001926 2EA3[0119]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15084                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15085                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15086 0000192A 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15087                                  					; # root dir entries
 15088 0000192E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15089 00001930 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15090                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15091                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15092 00001932 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15093                                  next_sec:				
 15094 00001933 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15095 00001934 2EA1[0119]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15096                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15097                                  					; get sector #
 15098 00001938 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15099                                  					; sectors / track
 15100 0000193C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15101 0000193E F7F1                    		div	cx
 15102                                  
 15103                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15104                                  
 15105 00001940 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15106                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15107 00001941 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15108 00001943 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15109 00001945 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15110                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15111 00001949 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15112 0000194B 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15113 0000194D E828EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15114                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15115 00001950 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15116 00001952 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15117 00001955 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15118                                  fvid_loop:
 15119                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15120 00001957 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15121                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15122 00001959 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15123 0000195B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15124 0000195E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15125 00001960 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15126 00001963 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15127                                  ent_loop:				
 15128 00001965 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15129 00001968 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15130 0000196A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15131 0000196B 2EFF06[0119]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15132                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15133                                  					; next sector
 15134 00001970 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15135                                  notfound:
 15136                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15137                                  		;xor	si, si
 15138 00001972 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15139                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15140                                  
 15141                                  found_vid:
 15142                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15143                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 15144 00001974 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15145 00001975 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15146 00001977 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15147 00001978 57                      		push	di
 15148 00001979 1E                      		push	ds
 15149 0000197A 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15150 0000197B BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15151 0000197E B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15152                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15153 00001981 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15154                                  		;xor	al, al
 15155                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15156 00001983 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15157 00001984 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15158                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15159                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15160                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15161 00001985 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15162 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 15163                                  fvid_ret:
 15164                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15165 00001987 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15166                                  				
 15167 00001989 58                      		pop	ax
 15168                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15169                                  		; cf = 0
 15170                                  		;clc
 15171                                  rvidret:
 15172 0000198A 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15173 0000198B 59                      		pop	cx
 15174 0000198C 5A                      		pop	dx
 15175 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15176                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15177                                  
 15178                                  no_vid:
 15179 0000198E 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15180                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15181                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15182 0000198F EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15183                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15184                                  
 15185                                  readviderr:				
 15186 00001991 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15187 00001992 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15188 00001993 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15189                                  
 15190                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15191                                  
 15192                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15193                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15194                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15195 00001995 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15196                                  		;
 15197                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15198                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15199                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15200                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15201 00001998 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15202 0000199B B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15203                                  		;
 15204 0000199E FC                      		cld
 15205 0000199F C3                      		retn
 15206                                  
 15207                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15208                                  
 15209                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15210                                  ;
 15211                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15212                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15213                                  
 15214                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15215 000019A0 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15216 000019A1 56                      		push	si
 15217 000019A2 51                      		push	cx
 15218                                  		
 15219                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15220                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15221                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15222                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15223                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15224                                  		;cld
 15225                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15226 000019A3 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15227                                  
 15228 000019A6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15229 000019A8 59                      		pop	cx
 15230 000019A9 5E                      		pop	si
 15231 000019AA 5F                      		pop	di
 15232 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15233                                  
 15234                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15235                                  
 15236                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15237                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15238                                  ;
 15239                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15240                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15241                                  
 15242                                  check_volume_id:
 15243 000019AC 57                      		push	di
 15244 000019AD 51                      		push	cx
 15245                                  		
 15246                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15247                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15248                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15249                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15250                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15251                                  		;cld
 15252                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15253 000019AE E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15254                                  
 15255 000019B1 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15256 000019B3 59                      		pop	cx
 15257 000019B4 5F                      		pop	di
 15258 000019B5 C3                      		retn
 15259                                  
 15260                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15261                                  
 15262                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15263                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15264                                  ;
 15265                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15266                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15267                                  ;
 15268                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15269                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15270                                  ;
 15271                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15272                                  
 15273                                  fat_check:		
 15274 000019B6 50                      		push	ax
 15275 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15276 000019B9 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15277 000019BC 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15278                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15279 000019C0 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15280 000019C2 4E                      		dec	si
 15281                                  okret1:					
 15282 000019C3 58                      		pop	ax
 15283 000019C4 C3                      		retn
 15284                                  
 15285                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15286                                  
 15287                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15288                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15289                                  
 15290                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15291                                  
 15292                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15293                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15294                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15295                                  
 15296                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15297                                  
 15298                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15299                                  		;db 0
 15300                                  
 15301                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15302                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15303                                  
 15304                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15305 000019C5 00<rep Bh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15306                                  %endif
 15307                                  
 15308                                  ;align 16
 15309                                  
 15310                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15311                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15312                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15313                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15314                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15315                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15316                                  
 15317                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------

 15320                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 15322                                  ; end of BIOSCODE
