 19336 00000945 57                      	push	di				; save end of BIOS
 19337 00000946 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 19338                                  	;
 19339                                  	; 11/12/2022
 19340                                  	;mov	[cs:BCodeSeg],ax		; save it for later use
 19341                                  	;;call	dword ptr cs:_seg_reinit_ptr
 19342                                  	;call	far [cs:seg_reinit_ptr]		; far call to seg_reinit (M022)
 19343                                  	; ds = cs
 19344 00000948 A3[0004]                	mov	[BCodeSeg],ax
 19345 0000094B FF1E[8502]              	call	far [seg_reinit_ptr]
 19346                                  	;
 19347 0000094F 5F                      	pop	di
 19348 00000950 07                      	pop	es				; get back end of BIOS
 19349 00000951 C3                      	retn

 19352

 19491                                  
 19492                                  ; BUGBUG -- 5 Aug 92 -- chuckst -- Allocating space for DOS
 19493                                  ;	  using DOS itself causes an arena to be generated.
 19494                                  ;	  Unfortunately, certain programs (like PROTMAN$)
 19495                                  ;	  assume that the device drivers are loaded into
 19496                                  ;	  the first arena. For this reason, MagicDrv's
 19497                                  ;	  main device driver header arena is manually
 19498                                  ;	  truncated from the arena chain, and the space
 19499                                  ;	  for DOS is allocated using the following
 19500                                  ;	  simple code, which also assumes that the
 19501                                  ;	  first arena is the free one where DOS's low
 19502                                  ;	  stub will go.
 19503                                  ;
 19504                                  ; M012 : BEGIN
 19505                                  
 19506                                  	; 23/10/2022
 19507                                  update_arena:
 19508 00000982 1E                      	push	ds ; ds = cs
 19509 00000983 57                      	push	di
 19510 00000984 51                      	push	cx
 19511 00000985 52                      	push	dx
 19512                                  	; 23/10/2022
 19513                                  	;lds	di,[cs:DOSINFO]			; get ptr to DOS var
 19514                                  	; 11/12/2022
 19515                                  	; ds = cs 
 19516 00000986 C53E[6B02]              	lds	di,[DOSINFO] ; 27/03/2019	
 19517 0000098A 4F                      	dec	di
 19518 0000098B 4F                      	dec	di				; Arena head is immediately
 19519                                  						;  before sysvar
 19520 0000098C 8E05                    	mov	es,[di]				; es = arena head
 19521                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]		; cx = total low mem size
 19522 0000098E 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:3]
 19523 00000993 39D9                    	cmp	cx,bx				; is it sufficient ?
 19524 00000995 7227                    	jb	short FatalErr			; no, fatal error
 19525                                  
 19526                                  	;mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 19527 00000997 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:0]
 19528 0000099C 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 19529 0000099E 01D8                    	add	ax,bx				; ax = new arena head
 19530 000009A0 8905                    	mov	[di],ax				; store it in DOS data area
 19531 000009A2 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 19532                                  	;mov	[ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl		; type of arena
 19533 000009A4 88160000                	mov	[0],dl
 19534                                  	;mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],0		; free
 19535 000009A8 C70601000000            	mov	word [1],0
 19536 000009AE 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx				; size of the new block
 19537                                  	;mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx			; store it in the arena
 19538 000009B0 890E0300                	mov	[3],cx
 19539 000009B4 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es				; return seg to the caller
 19540                                  	; 23/10/2022
 19541                                  	;; 24/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (ORG 0)	; Take care ORG 30h of
 19542 000009B6 83E803                  	sub	ax,3				;  BIOS code
 19543 000009B9 5A                      	pop	dx
 19544 000009BA 59                      	pop	cx
 19545 000009BB 5F                      	pop	di
 19546 000009BC 1F                      	pop	ds ; ds = cs
 19547 000009BD C3                      	retn
 19548                                  ;
 19549                                  ; M012 : END
 19550                                  ;

 19569                                  ; procedure : AllocHMA
 19570                                  ;
 19571                                  ;	grab_the_hma tries to enable a20 and make sure there is memory
 19572                                  ;	  up there. If it gets any sort of error, it will return with
 19573                                  ;	  carry set so that we can resort to running low.
 19574                                  ;
 19575                                  ;	It also returns ES: -> 0ffffh if it returns success
 19576                                  ;
 19577                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19578                                  
 19579                                  AllocHMA:
 19580                                  ;	cas note:  The pre-286 check is no longer needed here since the
 19581                                  ;		   presence of XMS is sufficient. However, this code hasn't
 19582                                  ;		   been deleted because it can be recycled for skipping the
 19583                                  ;		   extra pass of CONFIG.SYS and assuming we're running low
 19584                                  ;		   in the case of a pre-286.

 19586                                  ;;	see if we're running on a pre-286. If not, force low.
 19587                                  ;

 19589                                  ;	pushf			; save flags (like int)
 19590                                  ;	push	ax
 19591                                  ;	popf
 19592                                  ;	pushf
 19593                                  ;	pop	ax
 19594                                  ;	popf			; restore original flags (like int)

 19598

 19600                                  	; (SYSINIT:0A26h)

 19615                                  		; Return: ES:BX -> driver entry point
 19616

 19737                                  
 19738                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19739                                  ;
 19740                                  ; following piece of code will be moved into a para boundary. And the para
 19741                                  ; address posted in seg of int 19h vector. Offset of int 19h will point to
 19742                                  ; VDint19. This is to protect HMA from apps which use VDISK header method
 19743                                  ; to determine free extended memory.
 19744                                  ;
 19745                                  ; For more details read "power programming" column by Ray Duncan in the
 19746                                  ; May 30 1989 issue of PC Magazine (pp 377-388) [USING EXTENDED MEMORY,PART 1]
 19747                                  ;
 19748                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19749                                  
 19750                                  StartVDHead:
 19751                                  ;-------------- what follows is a dummy device driver header (not used by DOS)
 19752                                  
 19753 00000A41 00000000                	dd	0		; link to next device driver
 19754 00000A45 0080                    	dw	8000h		; device attribute
 19755 00000A47 0000                    	dw	0		; strategy routine offset
 19756 00000A49 0000                    	dw	0		; interrupt routine offset
 19757 00000A4B 01                      	db	1		; number of units
 19758                                  	;db	7 dup(0) 
 19759 00000A4C 00<rep 7h>              	times	7 db 0 		; reserved area
 19760                                  VDiskSig1:
 19761 00000A53 564449534B              	db	'VDISK'
 19762                                  
 19763                                  VLEN1	equ	($-VDiskSig1)
 19764                                  
 19765 00000A58 202056332E33            	db	'  V3.3'	; vdisk label
 19766                                  	;db	15 dup (0)	; pad
 19767 00000A5E 00<rep Fh>              	times	15 db 0
 19768 00000A6D 0000                    	dw	0		; bits 0-15 of free HMA
 19769 00000A6F 11                      	db	11h		; bits 16-23 of free HMA (1M + 64K)
 19770                                  VDInt19:
 19771 00000A70 EA                      	db	0EAh		; jmp to old vector
 19772                                  OldVDInt19:
 19773 00000A71 00000000                	dd	0		; Saved int 19 vector
 19774                                  
 19775                                  EndVDHead: ; label byte
 19776                                  
 19777                                  VDiskHMAHead:	
 19778 00000A75 000000                  	db	0,0,0		; non-bootable disk
 19779                                  VDiskSig2:
 19780 00000A78 564449534B              	db	'VDISK'
 19781                                  
 19782                                  VLEN2	equ	($-VDiskSig2)
 19783                                  
 19784 00000A7D 332E33                  	db	'3.3'		; OEM - signature
 19785 00000A80 8000                    	dw	128		; number of bytes/sector
 19786 00000A82 01                      	db	1		; sectors/cluster
 19787 00000A83 0100                    	dw	1		; reserved sectors
 19788 00000A85 01                      	db	1		; number of FAT copies
 19789 00000A86 4000                    	dw	64		; number of root dir entries
 19790 00000A88 0002                    	dw	512		; number of sectors
 19791 00000A8A FE                      	db	0FEh		; media descriptor
 19792 00000A8B 0600                    	dw	6		; number of sectors/FAT
 19793 00000A8D 0800                    	dw	8		; sectors per track
 19794 00000A8F 0100                    	dw	1		; number of heads
 19795 00000A91 0000                    	dw	0		; number of hidden sectors
 19796 00000A93 4004                    	dw	440h		; Start of free HMA in K (1M+64K)
 19797                                  
 19798                                  EndVDiskHMAHead: ; label byte
 19799                                  
 19800                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19801                                  ;
 19802                                  ; procedure : InstVDiskHeader
 19803                                  ;
 19804                                  ;             Installs the VDISK header to reserve the 64k of HMA
 19805                                  ;	      It puts a 32 byte header at 10000:0 and
 19806                                  ;	      another header at (seg of int19):0
 19807                                  ;
 19808                                  ; Inputs : None
 19809                                  ;
 19810                                  ; Outputs : None
 19811                                  ;
 19812                                  ; USES : DS,SI,AX,CX,DX
 19813                                  ;
 19814                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19815                                  
 19816                                  	; 23/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 19817                                  
 19818                                  InstVDiskHeader:
 19819 00000A95 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 19820 00000A97 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; seg of int vect table
 19821                                  
 19822                                  ;-------------- save old int 19 vector
 19823                                  
 19824                                  	; 23/10/2022
 19825 00000A99 A16400                  	mov	ax,[19h*4]
 19826                                  	;mov	[OldVDInt19],ax
 19827 00000A9C 2EA3[710A]              	mov	[cs:OldVDInt19],ax
 19828 00000AA0 A16600                  	mov	ax,[19h*4+2]
 19829                                  	;mov	[OldVDInt19+2],ax
 19830 00000AA3 2EA3[730A]              	mov	[cs:OldVDInt19+2],ax
 19831                                  
 19832                                  ;-------------- calculate seg of new int 19 handler
 19833                                  
 19834 00000AA7 B448                    	mov	ah,48h			; allocate memory
 19835                                  	;mov	bx,(EndVDHead-StartVDHead+15)>>4
 19836                                  	; 23/10/2022
 19837 00000AA9 BB0400                  	mov	bx,4
 19838 00000AAC CD21                    	int	21h
 19839                                  
 19840                                  ;	if carry, fatal hanging error!!!!!
 19841                                  
 19842 00000AAE 48                      	dec	ax			; point to arena
 19843 00000AAF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 19844                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; owner = System
 19845 00000AB1 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:1],8
 19846                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; System Code
 19847 00000AB8 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:8],'SC'
 19848 00000ABF 40                      	inc	ax
 19849 00000AC0 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; get back to allocated memory
 19850                                  
 19851                                  ;-------------- install new int 19 vector
 19852                                  
 19853 00000AC2 FA                      	cli				; no reboots at this time
 19854                                  	;mov	word [19h*4],(VDInt19-StartVDHead)
 19855 00000AC3 C70664002F00            	mov	word [19h*4],47
 19856 00000AC9 A36600                  	mov	[19h*4+2],ax
 19857                                  
 19858                                  ;-------------- move the code into proper place
 19859                                  
 19860                                  	;mov	cx,(EndVDHead-StartVDHead)
 19861 00000ACC B93400                  	mov	cx,52
 19862 00000ACF BE[410A]                	mov	si,StartVDHead
 19863 00000AD2 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 19864 00000AD4 0E                      	push	cs
 19865 00000AD5 1F                      	pop	ds
 19866 00000AD6 FC                      	cld
 19867 00000AD7 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 19868 00000AD9 FB                      	sti				; BUGBUG is sti OK now?
 19869                                  
 19870                                  ;-------------- mov the HMA VDisk head into HMA
 19871                                  
 19872                                  	; 23/10/2022
 19873 00000ADA 57                      	push	di
 19874 00000ADB 06                      	push	es
 19875                                  
 19876                                  	;mov	ax,0FFFFh
 19877                                  	;mov	es,ax
 19878                                  	; 04/09/2023
 19879 00000ADC 49                      	dec	cx
 19880                                  	; cx = 0FFFFh
 19881 00000ADD 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx
 19882                                  
 19883 00000ADF BF1000                  	mov	di,10h
 19884                                  	;mov	cx,(EndVDiskHMAHead-VDiskHMAHead)
 19885 00000AE2 B92000                  	mov	cx,32
 19886 00000AE5 BE[750A]                	mov	si,VDiskHMAHead
 19887 00000AE8 F3A4                    	rep	movsb			; ds already set to cs
 19888                                  
 19889 00000AEA 5F                      	pop	di
 19890 00000AEB 07                      	pop	es
 19891                                  
 19892 00000AEC C3                      	retn
 19893                                  
 19894                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19895                                  ; procedure : ClrVDISKHeader
 19896                                  ;
 19897                                  ;		Clears the first 32 bytes at 1MB boundary
 19898                                  ;		So that DOS/HIMEM is not confused about the VDISK header
 19899                                  ;		left by previous DOS=HIGH session

 19938                                  ; 25/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, MSDOS 6.0 SYSINIt1.ASM)
 19939                                  
 19940                                  ClrVDISKHeader:	; proc	near
 19941                                  
 19942                                  ;;-----------------------------------------------------------	      ;I070
 19943                                  ;; The following workaround get around a problem with the	      ;I070
 19944                                  ;; Tortugas and PS/2 30-286 BIOS when password server mode	      ;I070
 19945                                  ;; is set. On those machines the INT 15h block move code	      ;I070
 19946                                  ;; goes through the 8042 to twiddle A20 instead of port 92h.	      ;I070
 19947                                  ;; In password server mode the 8042 is disabled so the block	      ;I070
 19948                                  ;; move crashes the system. We can do this because these	      ;I070
 19949                                  ;; systems clear all of memory on a cold boot.			      ;I070
 19950                                  ;								      ;I070
 19951                                  ;               in      al,64h         ; Test for password servr mode ;I070
 19952                                  ;               test    al,10h         ; Is keyboard inhibited?	      ;I070
 19953                                  ;               jnz     short ClrVDISKok ; No, go do block move.      ;I070
 19954                                  ;                                      ; Check for Tortugas...	      ;I070
 19955                                  ;               cmp     word [cs:sys_model_byte],19F8h                ;I070
 19956                                  ;               je      short ClrVDISKno                              ;I070
 19957                                  ;                                      ; Check for mod 30-286	      ;I070
 19958                                  ;               cmp     word [cs:sys_model_byte],09FCh                ;I070
 19959                                  ;               jne     short ClrVDISKok			      ;I070
 19960                                  ;ClrVDISKno: 	retn	               ; Return w/o block move.	      ;I070
 19961                                  ;								      ;I070
 19962                                  ;ClrVDISKok:							      ;I070
 19963                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------	      ;I070
 19964                                  
 19965                                  	; 12/12/2022
 19966                                  	; ds = cs
 19967                                  
 19968 00000B3D 06                      	push	es
 19969 00000B3E 8CC8                    	mov	ax,cs
 19970 00000B40 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax
 19971 00000B42 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 19972 00000B44 D3EA                    	shr	dx,cl
 19973 00000B46 B104                    	mov	cl,4
 19974 00000B48 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl
 19975 00000B4A 05[1D0B]                	add	ax,ClrdVDISKHead
 19976 00000B4D 80D200                  	adc	dl,0
 19977                                  
 19978                                  	;; 23/10/2022
 19979                                  	;;mov	[cs:src_desc+desc.lo_word],ax
 19980                                  	;mov	[cs:src_desc+2],ax
 19981                                  	;;mov	[cs:src_desc+desc.hi_byte],dl
 19982                                  	;mov	[cs:src_desc+4],dl

 19984                                  	;mov	[src_desc+desc.lo_word],ax

 19986                                  	;mov	[src_desc+desc.hi_byte],dl
 19987 00000B53 8816[010B]              	mov	[src_desc+4],dl

 19989 00000B57 B91000                  	mov	cx,16	; 16 words
 19990 00000B5A 0E                      	push	cs
 19991 00000B5B 07                      	pop	es
 19992 00000B5C BE[ED0A]                	mov	si,bmove
 19993 00000B5F B487                    	mov	ah,87h

 19995                                  			; CX = number of words to move

 20003                                  ; procedure : SaveFreeHMAPtr

 20005                                  ;		Save the Free HMA pointer in BIOS variable for later use.

 20007                                  ;		Normalizes the pointer to ffff:xxxx format and stores only
 20008                                  ;		the offset.

 20022 00000B6D B8FFFF                  	mov	ax,0FFFFh	   ; HMA segment

 20027 00000B75 83C70F                  	add	di,15		   ; para round
 20028 00000B78 83E7F0                  	and	di,0FFF0h

 20030 00000B7D D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl
 20031 00000B7F 29C7                    	sub	di,ax
 20032                                  	;
 20033                                  	; 04/09/2023

 20035                                  	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data ; 0070h

 20043 00000B85 1F                      	pop	ds

 20087                                  ; procedure : CPMHack
 20088                                  ;
 20089                                  ;		Copies the code from 0:c0 into ffff:0d0h
 20090                                  ;		for CPM compatibility
 20091                                  ;
 20092                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 20093                                  
 20094                                  	; 11/12/2022
 20095                                  CPMHack:
 20096 00000BAE 1E                      	push	ds
 20097 00000BAF B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,0FFFFh
 20098 00000BB2 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx		; ES = FFFF
 20099                                  	;xor	cx,cx
 20100                                  	; 11/12/2022
 20101 00000BB4 41                      	inc	cx  ; cx = 0
 20102 00000BB5 8ED9                    	mov	ds,cx		; DS = 0
 20103 00000BB7 BEC000                  	mov	si,0C0h
 20104 00000BBA BFD000                  	mov	di,0D0h
 20105                                  	;mov	cx,5
 20106 00000BBD B105                    	mov	cl,5
 20107 00000BBF FC                      	cld
 20108 00000BC0 F3A4                    	rep	movsb		; move 5 bytes from 0:C0 to FFFF:D0
 20109 00000BC2 1F                      	pop	ds
 20110 00000BC3 C3                      	retn

 20354                                  endfile:
 20355                                  ; we are now setting up final cdss,buffers,files,fcss strings etc. we no
 20356                                  ; longer need the space taken by the temp stuff below confbot,so set alloclim
 20357                                  ; to confbot.

 20361

 20729                                  ; input :								       *

 20992                                  
 20993                                  ;global rearm command for shared interrupt devices attached in the system;
 20994                                  ;shared interrupt attachment has some problem when it issues interrupt
 20995                                  ;during a warm reboot. once the interrupt is presented by the attachment,
 20996                                  ;no further interrupts on that level will be presented until a global rearm
 20997                                  ;is issued. by the request of the system architecture group, msbio will
 20998                                  ;issue a global rearm after every device driver is loaded.
 20999                                  ;to issue a global rearm:	;for pc1,xt,palace
 21000                                  ;
 21001                                  ;			  out 02f2h,xx  ; interrupt level 2
 21002                                  ;			  out 02f3h,xx  ; interrupt level 3
 21003                                  ;			  out 02f4h,xx  ; interrupt level 4
 21004                                  ;			  out 02f5h,xx  ; interrupt level 5
 21005                                  ;			  out 02f6h,xx  ; interrupt level 6
 21006                                  ;			  out 02f7h,xx  ; interrupt level 7
 21007                                  ;
 21008                                  ;	for pc at,in addition to the above commands,
 21009                                  ;	need to handle the secondary interrupt handler
 21010                                  ;
 21011                                  ;			  out 06f2h,xx  ; interrupt level 10
 21012                                  ;			  out 06f3h,xx  ; interrupt level 11
 21013                                  ;			  out 06f4h,xx  ; interrupt level 12
 21014                                  ;			  out 06f6h,xx  ; interrupt level 14
 21015                                  ;			  out 06f7h,xx  ; interrupt level 15
 21016                                  ;
 21017                                  ;	for round-up machine
 21018                                  ;
 21019                                  ;			  none.
 21020                                  
 21021                                  ; where xx stands for any value.
 21022                                  ;
 21023                                  ; for your information,after naples level machine,the system service bios
 21024                                  ; call (int 15h),function ah=0c0h returns the system configuration parameters
 21025                                  
 21026                                  	; 24/10/2022
 21027                                  
 21028 00000F44 50                      	push	ax

 21034 00000F4A BAF202                  	mov	dx,2F2h 		;get starting address
 21035 00000F4D EE                      	out	dx,al			; out 02f2h,0ffh
 21036 00000F4E 42                      	inc	dx

 21038 00000F50 42                      	inc	dx

 21040 00000F52 42                      	inc	dx

 21229                                  ; 24/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT)	
 21230                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21231                                  ; Do_Install_Exec
 21232                                  ;
 21233                                  ; This procedure is used to EXEC a program being loaded via the 
 21234                                  ; "install=" mechanism in config.sys. It does this by setting up
 21235                                  ; the parameters, and then jumping to sysinit_base, which has been
 21236                                  ; setup in low memory. When complete, sysinit_base will jump back
 21237                                  ; up to this procedure (if sysinit remains uncorrupted by the installed
 21238                                  ; program).
 21239                                  
 21240                                  ;SYSINIT:10CFh:
 21241                                  
 21242                                  do_install_exec:			; now,handles install= command.
 21243                                  
 21244 0000102C 56                      	push	si			; save si for config.sys again.
 21245                                  
 21246                                  ; we are going to call load/exec function.
 21247                                  ; set es:bx to the parameter block here;;;;;;;
 21248                                  ; set ds:dx to the asciiz string. remember that we already has 0
 21249                                  ; after the filename. so parameter starts after that. if next
 21250                                  ; character is a line feed (i.e. 10),then assume that the 0
 21251                                  ; we already encountered used to be a carrage return. in this
 21252                                  ; case,let's set the length to 0 which will be followed by
 21253                                  ; carridge return.
 21254                                  
 21255                                  ; es:si -> command line in config.sys. points to the first non blank
 21256                                  ;character after =.
 21257                                  
 21258 0000102D 06                      	push	es
 21259 0000102E 1E                      	push	ds
 21260 0000102F 07                      	pop	es
 21261 00001030 1F                      	pop	ds			; es->sysinitseg,ds->confbot seg
 21262 00001031 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx->file name,0 in config.sys image.
 21263                                  
 21264 00001033 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21265 00001035 FC                      	cld
 21266 00001036 2EC606[6D03]20          	mov	byte [cs:ldexec_start],' ' ; clear out the parm area
 21267 0000103C BF[6E03]                	mov	di,ldexec_parm
 21268                                  installfilename:			; skip the file name
 21269 0000103F AC                      	lodsb				; al = ds:si; si++
 21270 00001040 3C00                    	cmp	al,0
 21271 00001042 7402                    	je	short got_installparm
 21272 00001044 EBF9                    	jmp	short installfilename
 21273                                  got_installparm:			; copy the parameters to ldexec_parm
 21274 00001046 AC                      	lodsb
 21275 00001047 268805                  	mov	[es:di],al
 21276 0000104A 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf	; cmp al,0Ah	; line feed?
 21277 0000104C 7405                    	je	short done_installparm
 21278 0000104E FEC1                    	inc	cl			; # of char. in the parm.
 21279 00001050 47                      	inc	di
 21280 00001051 EBF3                    	jmp	short got_installparm
 21281                                  done_installparm:
 21282 00001053 2E880E[6C03]            	mov	byte [cs:ldexec_line],cl ; length of the parm.
 21283 00001058 80F900                  	cmp	cl,0			; if no parm,then
 21284 0000105B 7506                    	jne	short install_seg_set 	; let the parm area
 21285 0000105D 2EC606[6D03]0D          	mov	byte [cs:ldexec_start],cr ; 0Dh 
 21286                                  					; starts with cr.
 21287                                  install_seg_set:
 21288 00001063 2EC70600000000          	mov	word [cs:0],0		; make a null environment segment
 21289 0000106A 8CC8                    	mov	ax,cs			; by overlap jmp instruction of sysinitseg.
 21290                                  
 21291                                  ;---------------------------------------------------M067----------------
 21292                                  ;
 21293                                  ; 	the environment pointer is made 0. so the current environment ptr.
 21294                                  ; 	will be the same as pdb_environ which after dosinit is 0.
 21295                                  ;
 21296                                  ; 	mov	cs:[instexe.exec0_environ],0 ; set the environment seg.
 21297                                  ;
 21298                                  ; 	instexe.exec0_environ need not be initialized to 0 above. It was
 21299                                  ; 	done as a fix for bug #529. The actual bug was in NLSFUNC and
 21300                                  ; 	was fixed. 
 21301                                  ;
 21302                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21303                                  
 21304                                  ;;ifdef   MULTI_CONFIG
 21305                                  
 21306                                  ; If there's any environment data in "config_wrkseg", pass to app
 21307                                  
 21308                                  	; 24/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT)
 21309                                          ;mov     cx,ax
 21310                                          ;cmp     word [cs:config_envlen],0
 21311                                          ;je      short no_envdata2
 21312                                          ;mov     cx,[cs:config_wrkseg]
 21313                                  ;no_envdata2:
 21314                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 21315                                  
 21316                                  	;mov	[cs:instexe.exec0_environ],cx ; set the environment seg.
 21317                                  	; 24/10/2022
 21318                                  	;mov	[cs:iexec.environ],cx
 21319                                  	; 02/11/2022
 21320 0000106C 2EA3[BE03]              	mov	[cs:iexec.environ],ax	
 21321                                  
 21322                                  	;mov	[cs:instexe.exec0_com_line+2],ax ; set the seg.
 21323 00001070 2EA3[C203]              	mov	[cs:iexec.ldexec_line+2],ax
 21324                                  	;mov	[cs:instexe.exec0_5c_fcb+2],ax
 21325 00001074 2EA3[C603]              	mov	[cs:iexec.ldexec_5c_fcb+2],ax
 21326                                  	;mov	[cs:instexe.exec0_6c_fcb+2],ax
 21327 00001078 2EA3[CA03]              	mov	[cs:iexec.ldexec_6c_fcb+2],ax
 21328 0000107C E86E00                  	call	sum_up
 21329 0000107F 26A3[5603]              	mov	[es:checksum],ax	; save the value of the sum
 21330 00001083 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 21331 00001085 B44B                    	mov	ah,4Bh ; EXEC		; load/exec
 21332 00001087 BB[BE03]                	mov	bx,instexe		; es:bx -> parm block.
 21333 0000108A 06                      	push	es			; save es,ds for load/exec
 21334 0000108B 1E                      	push	ds			; these registers will be restored in sysinit_base.
 21335 0000108C 2EFF2E[4E03]            	jmp	far [cs:sysinit_base_ptr] ; jmp to sysinit_base to execute
 21336                                  					; load/exec function and check sum.
 21337                                  
 21338                                  ;----------------------------------------
 21339                                  
 21340                                  ;j.k. this is the returning address from sysinit_base.
 21341                                  
 21342                                  	; 24/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT)
 21343                                  
 21344                                  sysinitptr:				; returning far address from sysinit_base
 21345 00001091 5E                      	pop	si			; restore si for config.sys file.
 21346 00001092 06                      	push	es
 21347 00001093 1E                      	push	ds
 21348 00001094 07                      	pop	es
 21349 00001095 1F                      	pop	ds			; now ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot
 21350 00001096 7306                            jnc     short install_exit_ret
 21351                                  
 21352 00001098 56                      	push	si			; error in loading the file for install=.
 21353 00001099 E8CC21                  	call	badload 		; es:si-> path,filename,0.
 21354 0000109C 5E                      	pop	si
 21355                                  
 21356                                  	; 24/10/2022
 21357                                  	;jmp	short sysinitptr_retn ; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:1140h)
 21358                                  	; 11/12/2022
 21359                                  	; ds = cs
 21360 0000109D C3                      	retn
 21361                                  
 21362                                  install_exit_ret:
 21363                                  	;retn		; retn (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:1283h) ; 18/12/2022
 21364                                  
 21365                                  	; 24/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT)
 21366                                  ;SYSINIT:1142h:
 21367 0000109E B44D                    	mov     ah,4Dh
 21368 000010A0 CD21                    	int     21h             ; DOS - 2+ - GET EXIT CODE OF SUBPROGRAM (WAIT)
 21369 000010A2 80FC03                  	cmp     ah,3
 21370 000010A5 7404                    	jz      short sysinitptr_retn
 21371 000010A7 E80316                  	call    error_line
 21372 000010AA F9                      	stc
 21373                                  sysinitptr_retn:	; (SYSINIT:114Fh)
 21374 000010AB C3                      	retn		
 21375                                  
 21376                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21377                                  
 21378                                  ;**	ParaRound - Round Up length to paragraph multiple
 21379                                  ;
 21380                                  ;	ParaRound rounds a byte count up to a multiple of 16, then divides
 21381                                  ;	by 16 yielding a "length in paragraphs" value.
 21382                                  ;
 21383                                  ;	ENTRY	(ax) = byte length
 21384                                  ;	EXIT	(ax) = rounded up length in paragraphs
 21385                                  ;	USES	ax, flags
 21386                                  
 21387                                  ParaRound:
 21388 000010AC 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 21389 000010AF D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 21390 000010B1 D1E8                    	shr	ax,1
 21391 000010B3 D1E8                    	shr	ax,1
 21392 000010B5 D1E8                    	shr	ax,1
 21393 000010B7 C3                      	retn
 21394                                  
 21395                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21396                                  ; sysinit_base module.
 21397                                  ;
 21398                                  ; This module is relocated by the routine EndFile to a location in low
 21399                                  ; memory. It is then called by SYSINIT to perform the EXEC of programs
 21400                                  ; that are being loaded by the "install=" command. After the EXEC call
 21401                                  ; completes, this module performs a checksum on the SYSINIT code (at the
 21402                                  ; top of memory) to be sure that the EXECed program did not damage it.
 21403                                  ; If it did, then this module will print an error message and stop the
 21404                                  ; system. Otherwise, it returns control to SYSINIT.
 21405                                  ;
 21406                                  ;in: after relocation,
 21407                                  ;    ax = 4b00h - load and execute the program dos function.
 21408                                  ;    ds = confbot. segment of config.sys file image
 21409                                  ;    es = sysinitseg. segment of sysinit module itself.
 21410                                  ;    ds:dx = pointer to asciiz string of the path,filename to be executed.
 21411                                  ;    es:bx = pointer to a parameter block for load.
 21412                                  ;    SI_end (byte) - offset vaule of end of sysinit module label
 21413                                  ;    bigsize (word) - # of word from confbot to SI_end.
 21414                                  ;    chksum (word) - sum of every byte from confbot to SI_end in a
 21415                                  ;			word boundary moduler form.
 21416                                  ;    sysinit_ptr (dword ptr) - return address to sysinit module.
 21417                                  ;
 21418                                  ;note: sysinit should save necessary registers and when the control is back
 21419                                  
 21420                                  	; 24/10/2022
 21421                                  	; (SYSINIT:115Ch for MSDOS 5.0 SYSINIT)
 21422                                  sysinit_base:				
 21423 000010B8 2E8C166200              	mov	[cs:sysinit_base_ss],ss	; save stack
 21424 000010BD 2E89266400              	mov	[cs:sysinit_base_sp],sp	
 21425 000010C2 CD21                    	int	21h			; load/exec dos call.
 21426 000010C4 2E8E166200              	mov	ss,[cs:sysinit_base_ss]	; restore stack
 21427 000010C9 2E8B266400              	mov	sp,[cs:sysinit_base_sp]
 21428 000010CE 1F                      	pop	ds			; restore confbot seg
 21429 000010CF 07                      	pop	es			; restore sysinitseg
 21430 000010D0 7216                    	jc	short sysinit_base_end	; load/exec function failed.
 21431                                  					; at this time,i don't have to worry about
 21432                                  					; that sysinit module has been broken or not.
 21433 000010D2 E81800                  	call	sum_up			; otherwise,check if it is good.
 21434 000010D5 263906[5603]            	cmp	[es:checksum],ax
 21435 000010DA 740C                    	je	short sysinit_base_end
 21436                                  
 21437                                  ;	memory broken. show "memory allocation error" message and stall.
 21438                                  
 21439 000010DC B409                    	mov	ah,9
 21440 000010DE 0E                      	push	cs
 21441 000010DF 1F                      	pop	ds
 21442 000010E0 BA6600                  	mov	dx,mem_alloc_err_msgx-sysinit_base ; 65h (for MSDOS 5.0 SYSINIT)
 21443 000010E3 CD21                    	int	21h
 21444                                  		; DOS - PRINT STRING
 21445                                  		; DS:DX -> string terminated by "$"
 21446                                  	; 24/10/2022
 21447                                  _stall: 
 21448                                  	; 11/12/2022
 21449 000010E5 F4                      	hlt 
 21450                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 21451                                  	;hlt				;use HLT to minimize energy consumption
 21452 000010E6 EBFD                            jmp	short _stall
 21453                                  
 21454                                  sysinit_base_end: 
 21455 000010E8 26FF2E[5203]            	jmp	far [es:sysinit_ptr]	;return back to sysinit module
 21456                                  
 21457                                  ;-------------------------------------
 21458                                  
 21459                                  sum_up:
 21460                                  
 21461                                  ;in:   es - sysinitseg.
 21462                                  ;out:  ax - result
 21463                                  ;
 21464                                  ;remark: since this routine will only check starting from "locstack" to the end of
 21465                                  ;	 sysinit segment,the data area, and the current stack area are not
 21466                                  ;	 coverd. in this sense,this check sum routine only gives a minimal
 21467                                  ;	 gaurantee to be safe.
 21468                                  ;
 21469                                  ;first sum up confbot seg.
 21470                                  
 21471 000010ED 1E                      	push	ds
 21472                                  	;mov	ax,[es:CONFBOT]
 21473                                  	; 24/10/2022
 21474 000010EE 26A1[A102]              	mov	ax,[es:top_of_cdss]
 21475 000010F2 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 21476 000010F4 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 21477 000010F6 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 21478 000010F8 268B0E[4C03]            	mov	cx,[es:config_size]	; if config_size has been broken,then this
 21479                                  					;whole test better fail.
 21480 000010FD D1E9                    	shr	cx,1			; make it a word count
 21481 000010FF 7406                    	jz	short sum_sys_code	; when config.sys file not exist.
 21482                                  sum1:
 21483 00001101 0304                    	add	ax,[si]
 21484 00001103 46                      	inc	si
 21485 00001104 46                      	inc	si
 21486 00001105 E2FA                    	loop	sum1
 21487                                  ;now,sum up sysinit module.
 21488                                  sum_sys_code:
 21489                                  	; 24/10/2022
 21490 00001107 BE0611                  	mov	si,locstack ; 5A6h (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT)
 21491                                  				        ; starting after the stack.  M069
 21492                                  					;  this does not cover the possible stack code!!!
 21493                                  	;;mov	cx,22688  ; for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS
 21494                                  	; 02/11/2022
 21495                                  	;mov	cx,3D20h  ; (15648) for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS (SYSINIT)	
 21496                                  	; 30/12/2022 (BugFix)
 21497                                  	; (SI_End is 39D0h for this -Retro DOS v4.0- IO.SYS)
 21498 0000110A B9[0038]                	mov	cx,SI_end ; (22688) 	; SI_end is the label at the end of sysinit
 21499 0000110D 29F1                    	sub	cx,si			;  from after_checksum to SI_end
 21500 0000110F D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 21501                                  sum2:
 21502 00001111 260304                  	add	ax,[es:si]
 21503 00001114 46                      	inc	si
 21504 00001115 46                      	inc	si
 21505 00001116 E2F9                    	loop	sum2
 21506 00001118 1F                      	pop	ds
 21507 00001119 C3                      	retn
 21508                                  
 21509                                  ; 24/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT)
 21510                                  
 21511                                  sysinit_base_ss equ $-sysinit_base  ; = 61 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:115Ch)
 21512                                  ;SYSINIT:11BDh:
 21513 0000111A 0000                    	dw	0
 21514                                  sysinit_base_sp equ $-sysinit_base  ; = 63 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:1161h)
 21515                                  ;SYSINIT:11BFh:
 21516 0000111C 0000                    	dw	0
 21517                                  
 21518                                  mem_alloc_err_msgx:
 21519                                  
 21520                                         ;include msbio.cl4		; memory allocation error message
 21521                                  
 21522                                  ;SYSINIT:12F6:  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS SYSINIT:12F6h
 21523 0000111E 0D0A                    	db	0Dh,0Ah
 21524 00001120 4D656D6F727920616C-     	db 	'Memory allocation error $'
 21524 00001129 6C6F636174696F6E20-
 21524 00001132 6572726F722024     
 21525                                  
 21526                                  end_sysinit_base: ; label byte

 21530                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21531                                  ; Set_Buffer
 21532                                  ;
 21533                                  ;function: set buffers in the real memory.				  
 21534                                  ;	   lastly set the memhi,memlo for the next available free address.
 21535                                  ;
 21536                                  ;input:    ds:bx -> buffinfo.
 21537                                  ;	   [memhi]:[memlo = 0] = available space for the hash bucket.	  
 21538                                  ;	   singlebuffersize = buffer header size + sector size		  
 21539                                  ;
 21540                                  ;output:   buffers Queue established.	       				   
 21541                                  ;	   [memhi]:[memlo] = address of the next available free space.	   
 21542                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21543                                  
 21544                                  	; 25/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT)
 21545                                  	; (SYSINIT:11DCh)
 21546                                  
 21547                                  set_buffer:
 21548 00001139 30D2                    	xor	dl,dl				; assume buffers not in HMA
 21549 0000113B E85500                  	call	GetBufferAddr
 21550 0000113E 7402                    	jz	short set_buff_1
 21551 00001140 B201                    	mov	dl,1				; buffers in HMA
 21552                                  set_buff_1:
 21553                                  	; 25/10/2022
 21554                                  	;mov	[bx+BUFFINF.Buff_Queue],di	; head of Buff Q
 21555 00001142 893F                    	mov	[bx],di
 21556                                  	;mov	[bx+BUFFINF.Buff_Queue+2],es
 21557 00001144 8C4702                  	mov	[bx+2],es
 21558                                  	;mov	word [bx+BUFFINF.Dirty_Buff_Count],0 ;set dirty_count to 0.
 21559 00001147 C747040000              	mov	word [bx+4],0
 21560                                  
 21561 0000114C 89F8                    	mov	ax,di
 21562 0000114E 2E8B0E[9702]            	mov	cx,[cs:buffers]
 21563 00001153 57                      	push	di				; remember first buffer
 21564                                  
 21565                                  ;	for each buffer
 21566                                  
 21567                                  nxt_buff:
 21568 00001154 E86100                  	call	set_buffer_info 		; set buf_link,buf_id...
 21569 00001157 89C7                    	mov	di,ax
 21570 00001159 E2F9                    	loop	nxt_buff
 21571                                  
 21572 0000115B 2E2B3E[9B02]            	sub	di,[cs:singlebuffersize]	; point to last buffer
 21573                                  
 21574 00001160 59                      	pop	cx				; get first buffer
 21575                                  	;mov	[es:di+buffinfo.buf_next],cx	; last->next = first
 21576 00001161 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx
 21577 00001164 87CF                    	xchg	cx,di
 21578                                  	;mov	[es:di+buffinfo.buf_prev],cx	; first->prev = last
 21579                                  	; 25/10/2022
 21580 00001166 26894D02                	mov	[es:di+2],cx
 21581                                  
 21582 0000116A 08D2                    	or	dl,dl				; In HMa ?
 21583 0000116C 7417                    	jz	short set_buff_2		; no
 21584                                  	;mov	byte [bx+BUFFINF.Buff_In_HMA],1
 21585 0000116E C6470C01                	mov	byte [bx+12],1
 21586 00001172 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]			; seg of scratch buff
 21587                                  	;mov	word [bx+BUFFINF.Lo_Mem_Buff],0	; offset of sctarch buff is 0
 21588 00001176 C7470D0000              	mov	word [bx+13],0
 21589                                  	;mov	[bx+BUFFINF.Lo_Mem_Buff+2],ax
 21590 0000117B 89470F                  	mov	word [bx+15],ax
 21591 0000117E 2EA1[9B02]              	mov	ax,[cs:singlebuffersize]	; size of scratch buff
 21592                                  	;sub	ax,bufinsiz ; 20		; buffer head not required
 21593 00001182 83E814                  	sub	ax,20
 21594                                  set_buff_2:
 21595 00001185 2E0106[DE03]            	add	[cs:memlo],ax
 21596                                  	;or	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 21597 0000118A 2E800E[1814]02          	or	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],2
 21598                                  	;call	round
 21599                                  	;retn
 21600                                  	; 12/12/2022
 21601 00001190 E9871E                  	jmp	round
 21602                                  
 21603                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21604                                  ; procedure : GetBufferAddr
 21605                                  ;
 21606                                  ;	      Gets the buffer address either in HMA or in Lo Mem
 21607                                  ;
 21608                                  ; returns in es:di the buffer adress
 21609                                  ; returns NZ if allocated in HMA
 21610                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21611                                  
 21612                                  	; 25/10/2022 
 21613                                  GetBufferAddr:
 21614 00001193 53                      	push	bx
 21615 00001194 52                      	push	dx
 21616 00001195 2EA1[9B02]              	mov	ax, [cs:singlebuffersize]
 21617 00001199 2EF726[9702]            	mul	word [cs:buffers]
 21618                                  	;add	ax,0Fh
 21619 0000119E 83C00F                  	add	ax,15 
 21620                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 21621                                  	;and	ax,~15	; 0FFF0h	; para round
 21622                                  	; 12/12/2022
 21623 000011A1 24F0                    	and	al,~15	; 0F0h
 21624 000011A3 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax
 21625 000011A5 B8024A                  	mov	ax,4A02h
 21626                                  	;mov	ax,((multMULT<<8)+multMULTALLOCHMA)
 21627 000011A8 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 21628 000011AA 83FFFF                  	cmp	di,0FFFFh
 21629 000011AD 7506                    	jne	short got_hma
 21630                                  
 21631                                  	;mov	di,0			; dont xor di,di Z flag needed
 21632                                  	; 05/09/2023
 21633                                  	; zf=1
 21634 000011AF 47                      	inc	di ; 0FFFFh -> 0
 21635                                  	; zf=1
 21636                                  
 21637                                  	;zf=1
 21638                                  	;xor	di,di	; 25/10/2022
 21639                                  	;zf=1
 21640 000011B0 2E8E06[E003]            	mov	es,[cs:memhi]
 21641                                  got_hma:
 21642 000011B5 5A                      	pop	dx
 21643 000011B6 5B                      	pop	bx
 21644 000011B7 C3                      	retn
 21645                                  
 21646                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21647                                  
 21648                                  set_buffer_info:
 21649                                  
 21650                                  ;function: set buf_link,buf_id,buf_sector
 21651                                  ;
 21652                                  ;in: es:di -> buffer header to be set.
 21653                                  ;    ax = di
 21654                                  ;
 21655                                  ;out:
 21656                                  ;    above entries set.
 21657                                  
 21658                                  	; 25/10/2022 
 21659 000011B8 2EFF36[3903]            	push	word [cs:buf_prev_off]
 21660                                  	;pop	word [es:di+buffinfo.buf_prev]
 21661 000011BD 268F4502                	pop	word [es:di+2]
 21662 000011C1 2EA3[3903]              	mov	[cs:buf_prev_off],ax
 21663 000011C5 2E0306[9B02]            	add	ax,[cs:singlebuffersize]	;adjust ax
 21664                                  	;mov	[es:di+buffinfo.buf_next],ax
 21665 000011CA 268905                  	mov	[es:di],ax
 21666                                  	;mov	word [es:di+buffinfo.buf_ID],00FFh  ; new buffer free
 21667 000011CD 26C74504FF00            	mov	word [es:di+4],00FFh
 21668                                  	;mov	word [es:di+buffinfo.buf_sector],0   ; to compensate the masm 3 bug
 21669 000011D3 26C745060000            	mov	word [es:di+6],0
 21670                                  	;mov	word [es:di+buffinfo.buf_sector+2],0 ; to compensate the masm 3 bug
 21671 000011D9 26C745080000            	mov	word [es:di+8],0
 21672 000011DF C3                      	retn
 21673                                  
 21674                                  ; ======================================================================
 21675                                  ; MSSTACK initialization routine - MSDOS 6.0 - SYSDINIT1.ASM - 1991
 21676                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21677                                  ; 27/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21678                                  
 21679                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 21680                                  ; ibmstack initialization routine.
 21681                                  ;
 21682                                  ;	to follow the standard interrupt sharing scheme, msstack.asm
 21683                                  ;	has been modified. this initialization routine also has to
 21684                                  ;	be modified because for the interrupt level 7 and 15, firstflag
 21685                                  ;	should be set to signal that this interrupt handler is the
 21686                                  ;	first handler hooked to this interrupt vector.
 21687                                  ;	we determine this by looking at the instruction pointed by
 21688                                  ;	this vector. if it is iret, then this handler should be the
 21689                                  ;	first one. in our case, only the interrupt vector 77h is the
 21690                                  ;	interrupt level 15. (we don't hook interrupt level 7.)
 21691                                  ;
 21692                                  ;	the followings are mainly due to m.r.t; ptm fix of p886 12/3/86
 21693                                  ;	some design changes are needed to the above interrupt sharing
 21694                                  ;	method. the above sharing scheme assumes that 1). interrupt
 21695                                  ;	sharing is never done on levels that have bios support. 2). "phantom"
 21696                                  ;	interrupts would only be generated on levels 7 and 15.
 21697                                  ;	these assumptions are not true any more. we have to use the firstflag
 21698                                  ;	for every level of interrupt. we will set the firstflag on the following
 21699                                  ;	conditions:
 21700                                  ;
 21701                                  ;	 a.	 if the cs portion of the vector is 0000, then "first"
 21702                                  ;	 b. else if cs:ip points to valid shared header, then not "first"
 21703                                  ;	 c. else if cs:ip points to an iret, then "first"
 21704                                  ;	 d. else if cs:ip points to dummy, then "first"
 21705                                  ;
 21706                                  ;	where dummy is - the cs portion must be f000, and the ip portion must
 21707                                  ;	be equal to the value at f000:ff01. this location is the initial value
 21708                                  ;	from vector_table for interrupt 7, one of the preserved addresses in all
 21709                                  ;	the bioses for all of the machines.
 21710                                  ;
 21711                                  ;	system design group requests bios to handle the phantom interrupts.
 21712                                  ;
 21713                                  ;	the "phantom" interrupt is an illegal interrupt such as an interrupt
 21714                                  ;	produced by the bogus adapter card even without interrupt request is
 21715                                  ;	set.  more specifically, 1). the 8259 has a feature when running in
 21716                                  ;	edge triggered mode to latch a pulse and present the interrupt when
 21717                                  ;	the processor indicates interrupt acknowledge (inta). the interrupt
 21718                                  ;	pulse was exist at the time of inta to get a "phantom" interrupt.
 21719                                  ;	2). or, this is caused by adapter cards placing a glitch on the
 21720                                  ;	interrupt line.
 21721                                  ;
 21722                                  ;	to handle those "phantom" interrupts, the main stack code will check
 21723                                  ;	the own firstflag, and if it is not "first" (which means the forward
 21724                                  ;	pointer points to the legal shared interrupt handler), then pass the
 21725                                  ;	control. if it is the first, then the following action should be
 21726                                  ;	taken. we don't have to implement skack logic in this case.
 21727                                  ;
 21728                                  ;	to implement this logic, we rather choose a simple method.
 21729                                  ;	if ont of the above "firstflag" conditions is met, we are not
 21730                                  ;	going to hook this interrupt vector. the reason is if the original
 21731                                  ;	vector points to "iret" and do nothing, we don't need
 21732                                  ;	to implement the stack logic for it. this will simplify implementation
 21733                                  ;	while maintaining compatibility with the old version of dos.
 21734                                  ;	this implies that in the main stack code, there might be a stack code
 21735                                  ;	that will never be used, a dead code.
 21736                                  ;
 21737                                  ;in - cs, ds -> sysinitseg, es -> relocated stack code & data.
 21738                                  
 21739                                  	; 25/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT)
 21740                                  	; (SYSINIT:1287h)
 21741                                  
 21742                                  	; 14/12/2022
 21743                                  stackinit:
 21744 000011E0 50                      	push	ax
 21745 000011E1 1E                      	push	ds
 21746 000011E2 06                      	push	es
 21747 000011E3 53                      	push	bx
 21748 000011E4 51                      	push	cx
 21749 000011E5 52                      	push	dx
 21750 000011E6 57                      	push	di
 21751 000011E7 56                      	push	si
 21752 000011E8 55                      	push	bp
 21753                                  
 21754                                  ;currently es -> stack code area
 21755                                  
 21756                                  	; 12/12/2022
 21757                                  	; ds = cs
 21758 000011E9 A1[8A02]                	mov	ax,[stack_count]
 21759 000011EC 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax  ; *!*!*  
 21760                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 21761                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:1290h)
 21762                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:stack_count] ; !!	;defined in cs
 21763 000011EE 26A3[0200]              	mov	[es:stackcount],ax		;defined in stack code area
 21764                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:1298h)
 21765 000011F2 A1[8C02]                	mov	ax,[stack_size]	 ; !!		;in cs
 21766 000011F5 26A3[0600]              	mov	[es:stacksize],ax
 21767                                  	; 12/12/2022
 21768 000011F9 A1[8E02]                	mov	ax,[stack_addr]			; offset
 21769                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 21770                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:129Fh)
 21771                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:stack_addr]  ; !!
 21772 000011FC 26A3[0800]              	mov	[es:stacks],ax
 21773                                  	; 12/12/2022
 21774 00001200 89C5                    	mov	bp,ax ; *!*
 21775 00001202 A1[9002]                	mov	ax,[stack_addr+2]
 21776                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 21777                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:129Fh)
 21778                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:stack_addr+2] ; !!	; segment
 21779 00001205 26A3[0A00]              	mov	[es:stacks+2],ax
 21780                                  
 21781                                  ; initialize the data fields with the parameters
 21782                                  
 21783                                  ; "firstentry" will always be at stacks
 21784                                  
 21785                                  	;mov	bp,[es:stacks]			; get offset of stack
 21786                                  	; 12/12/2022
 21787                                  	; bp = [es:stacks] ; *!*
 21788 00001209 26892E[0C00]            	mov	[es:firstentry],bp
 21789                                  
 21790                                  ; the stacks will always immediately follow the table entries
 21791                                  
 21792 0000120E B80800                  	mov	ax,entrysize ; 8
 21793                                  	;mov	cx,[es:stackcount]
 21794                                  	; 12/12/2022
 21795                                  	; cx = [es:stackcount] ; *!*!*
 21796 00001211 F7E1                    	mul	cx
 21797 00001213 01E8                    	add	ax,bp
 21798 00001215 26A3[0400]              	mov	[es:stackat],ax
 21799 00001219 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax
 21800 0000121B 83EB02                  	sub	bx,2
 21801                                  
 21802                                  ; zero the entire stack area to start with
 21803                                  
 21804 0000121E 268B3E[0400]            	mov	di,[es:stackat]
 21805 00001223 26A1[0600]              	mov	ax,[es:stacksize]
 21806 00001227 F7E1                    	mul	cx
 21807 00001229 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 21808 0000122B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 21809 0000122D 06                      	push	es
 21810 0000122E 1F                      	pop	ds				;ds = relocated stack code seg.
 21811                                  
 21812                                  ;now, ds -> stack code area
 21813                                  
 21814 0000122F 8E06[0A00]              	mov	es,[stacks+2]			; get segment of stack area.
 21815 00001233 FC                      	cld
 21816 00001234 F3AA                    	rep	stosb
 21817                                  
 21818 00001236 8B0E[0200]              	mov	cx,[stackcount]
 21819                                  
 21820                                  ; loop for "count" times, building a table entry
 21821                                  ;  cs = sysinitseg, ds = relocated stack code seg, es = segment of stack space
 21822                                  ;  cx = number of entries
 21823                                  ;  es:bp => base of stacks - 2
 21824                                  ;  es:bx => first table entry
 21825                                  
 21826                                  buildloop:
 21827                                  	; 11/12/2022
 21828                                  	;mov	byte [es:bp+allocbyte],free	; mov [es:bp+0],0
 21829                                  	; 25/10/2022
 21830                                  	;mov	byte [es:bp],free
 21831                                  	; 14/08/2023
 21832 0000123A 26884600                	mov	[es:bp],al ; 0 ; free
 21833 0000123E 26884601                	mov	[es:bp+intlevel],al	; ax = 0
 21834                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1],al
 21835 00001242 26894602                	mov	[es:bp+savedsp],ax
 21836                                  	;mov	[es:bp2],ax
 21837 00001246 26894604                	mov	[es:bp+savedss],ax
 21838                                  	;mov	[es:bp+4],ax
 21839 0000124A 031E[0600]              	add	bx,[stacksize]
 21840 0000124E 26895E06                	mov	[es:bp+newsp],bx		; mov [es:bp+6],bx
 21841                                  	;mov	[es:bp+6],bx
 21842 00001252 26892F                  	mov	[es:bx],bp
 21843 00001255 83C508                  	add	bp,entrysize ; 8
 21844                                  
 21845 00001258 E2E0                    	loop	buildloop
 21846                                  
 21847 0000125A 83ED08                  	sub	bp,entrysize ; 8
 21848 0000125D 892E[0E00]              	mov	[lastentry],bp
 21849 00001261 892E[1000]              	mov	[nextentry],bp
 21850                                  
 21851 00001265 1E                      	push	ds
 21852                                  	;mov	ax,0F000h		;look at the model byte
 21853                                  	; 05/09/2023
 21854 00001266 B4F0                    	mov	ah,0F0h ; ax = 0F000h
 21855 00001268 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 21856 0000126A 803EFEFFF9              	cmp	byte [0FFFEh],0F9h ; mdl_convert ;convertible?
 21857 0000126F 1F                      	pop	ds
 21858 00001270 7504                    	jne	short skip_disablenmis
 21859                                  
 21860 00001272 B007                    	mov	al,07h			; disable convertible nmis
 21861 00001274 E672                    	out	72h,al
 21862                                  
 21863                                  skip_disablenmis:
 21864 00001276 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 21865 00001278 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			;es - segid of vector table at 0
 21866                                  					;ds - relocated stack code segment
 21867 0000127A FA                      	cli
 21868                                  
 21869                                  	;irp	aa,<02,08,09,70>
 21870                                  	;
 21871                                  	;mov	si,aa&h*4		;pass where vector is to be adjusted
 21872                                  	;mov	di,offset int19old&aa	;we have to set old&aa for int19 handler too.
 21873                                  	;mov	bx,offset old&aa	;pass where to save original owner pointer
 21874                                  	;mov	dx,offset int&aa	;pass where new handler is
 21875                                  	;call	new_init_loop		;adjust the vector to new handler,
 21876                                  	;				;saving pointer to original owner
 21877                                  	;endm
 21878                                  
 21879                                  stkinit_02:
 21880 0000127B BE0800                  	mov	si,02h*4 ; 8
 21881 0000127E BF[4206]                	mov	di,INT19OLD02
 21882 00001281 BB[1200]                	mov	bx,old02
 21883 00001284 BA[1600]                	mov	dx,int02
 21884 00001287 E84801                  	call	new_init_loop
 21885                                  stkinit_08:
 21886 0000128A BE2000                  	mov	si,08h*4 ; 32
 21887 0000128D BF[4706]                	mov	di,INT19OLD08
 21888 00001290 BB[3800]                	mov	bx,old08
 21889 00001293 BA[3C00]                	mov	dx,int08
 21890 00001296 E83901                  	call	new_init_loop
 21891                                  stkinit_09:
 21892 00001299 BE2400                  	mov	si,09h*4 ; 36
 21893 0000129C BF[4C06]                	mov	di,INT19OLD09
 21894 0000129F BB[4100]                	mov	bx,old09
 21895 000012A2 BA[4500]                	mov	dx,int09
 21896 000012A5 E82A01                  	call	new_init_loop
 21897                                  stkinit_70:
 21898 000012A8 BEC001                  	mov	si,70h*4 ; 448
 21899 000012AB BF[6A06]                	mov	di,INT19OLD70
 21900 000012AE BB[4E00]                	mov	bx,old70
 21901 000012B1 BA[5200]                	mov	dx,int70
 21902 000012B4 E81B01                  	call	new_init_loop
 21903                                  
 21904                                  	;irp	aa,<0a,0b,0c,0d,0e,72,73,74,76,77> ;shared interrupts
 21905                                  	;
 21906                                  	;mov	si,aa&h*4		;pass where vector is to be adjusted
 21907                                  	;push	ds			;save relocated stack code segment
 21908                                  	;lds	bx, es:[si]		;ds:bx -> original interrupt handler

 21910                                  	;pop	dx			;dx = segment value
 21911                                  	;

 21916                                  	;jz	int&aa&_first
 21917                                  	;

 21919                                  	;jz	int&aa&_not_first
 21920                                  	;
 21921                                  	;cmp	dx,0f000h		;rom bios segment
 21922                                  	;jnz	int&aa&_not_first
 21923                                  	;
 21924                                  	;push	es
 21925                                  	;push	dx
 21926                                  	;mov	dx,0f000h

 21934                                  	;pop	ds
 21935                                  	;mov	di, offset int19old&aa	;we have to set old&aa for int19 handler too.

 21941                                  ;int&aa&_first:				;the first. don't have to hook stack code.
 21942                                  	;pop	ds

 21944                                  	;

 22581                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 22582                                  ; 27/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22583                                  
 22584                                  ; 25/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT)
 22585                                  ; (SYSINIT:1610h)
 22586                                  
 22587                                  new_init_loop:
 22588                                  
 22589                                  ;input: si=ofset into vector table of the particular int vector being adjusted
 22590                                  ;	bx=ds:offset of oldxx, where will be saved the pointer to original owner
 22591                                  ;	dx=ds:offset of intxx, the new interrupt handler
 22592                                  ;	di=offset value of int19old&aa variable in bios.
 22593                                  ;	es=zero, segid of vector table
 22594                                  ;	ds=relocated stack code segment
 22595                                  
 22596 000013D2 268B04                  	mov	ax,[es:si]		;remember offset in vector
 22597 000013D5 8907                    	mov	[bx],ax			; to original owner in ds
 22598 000013D7 268B4402                	mov	ax,[es:si+2]		;remember segid in vector
 22599 000013DB 894702                  	mov	[bx+2],ax		; to original owner in ds
 22600                                  
 22601 000013DE 1E                      	push	ds
 22602                                  	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data ; 70h
 22603                                  	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 22604                                  	; 21/10/2022
 22605 000013DF B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h
 22606 000013E2 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			;set int19oldxx value in bios for
 22607 000013E4 268B04                  	mov	ax,[es:si]		;int 19 handler
 22608 000013E7 8905                    	mov	[di],ax
 22609 000013E9 268B4402                	mov	ax,[es:si+2]
 22610 000013ED 894502                  	mov	[di+2],ax
 22611 000013F0 1F                      	pop	ds
 22612                                  
 22613 000013F1 268914                  	mov	[es:si],dx  	;set vector to point to new int handler
 22614 000013F4 268C5C02                	mov	[es:si+2],ds
 22615 000013F8 C3                      	retn
 22616                                  
 22617                                  ; End of STACK initialization routine
 22618                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 22619                                  
 22620                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 22621                                  ;set the devmark for mem command.
 22622                                  ;in: [memhi] - the address to place devmark
 22623                                  ;    [memlo] = 0
 22624                                  ;    al = id for devmark_id
 22625                                  ;out: devmark established.
 22626                                  ;     the address saved in cs:[devmark_addr]
 22627                                  ;     [memhi] increase by 1.
 22628                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 22629                                  
 22630                                  ; 25/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, SYSINIT)
 22631                                  ; (SYSINIT:1637h)

 22633                                  ; (SYSINIT:176Ch)
 22634
