 31074                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31075                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31076                                  
 31077                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31078                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31079                                  hu_X:	
 31080                                  	pop	es
 31081                                  	pop	dx
 31082                                  	pop	bx
 31083                                  	retn
 31084                                  
 31085                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31086                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31087                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31088                                  ; Entry:  None
 31089                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31090                                  ; Error:  None
 31091                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31092                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31093                                  
 31094                                  UnFreeze:
 31095                                  	push	ax
 31096                                  	push	es
 31097                                  
 31098                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31099                                  	jc	short ufX
 31100                                  
 31101                                  	mov	es,ax
 31102                                  
 31103                                  ; ------------------------------
 31104                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31105                                  ; ------------------------------
 31106                                  
 31107                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 31108                                  	jnz	short uf20
 31109                                  	call	unHideMCB
 31110                                  uf20:	
 31111                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31112                                  
 31113                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31114                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31115                                  
 31116                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31117                                  	mov     ax,es
 31118                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31119                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31120                                  	inc     ax
 31121                                  	mov     es,ax
 31122                                  
 31123                                  	jmp	short uf10
 31124                                  ufX:	
 31125                                  	pop	es
 31126                                  	pop	ax
 31127                                  	retn
 31128                                  
 31129                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31130                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 31131                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31132                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31133                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 31134                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31135                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31136                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31137                                  
 31138                                  isFrozMCB:
 31139                                  	;push	ax
 31140                                  
 31141                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31142                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31143                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 31144                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31145                                  
 31146                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 31147                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 31148                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31149                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31150                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31151                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 31152                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31153                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31154                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31155                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31156                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31157                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31158                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31159                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31160                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31161                                  ifmX:	
 31162                                  	;pop	ax
 31163                                  	retn
 31164                                  
 31165                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31166                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 31167                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31168                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31169                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 31170                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31171                                  ; USES:     None
 31172                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31173                                  
 31174                                  frezMCB:
 31175                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 31176                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31177                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31178                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31179                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31180                                  	retn
 31181                                  
 31182                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31183                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 31184                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31185                                  ; Entry:  None
 31186                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 31187                                  ; Error:  None
 31188                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31189                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31190                                  
 31191                                  FreezeUM:
 31192                                  	push	ax
 31193                                  	push	cx
 31194                                  	push	dx
 31195                                  	push	es
 31196                                  
 31197                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 31198                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31199                                  
 31200                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31201                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 31202                                  
 31203                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31204                                  	mov	es,ax
 31205                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31206                                  
 31207                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31208                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 31209                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 31210                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 31211                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31212                                  
 31213                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31214                                  	jnz	short fum20
 31215                                  
 31216                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31217                                  fum20:	
 31218                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31219                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31220                                  
 31221                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31222                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31223                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31224                                  
 31225                                  	call	frezMCB
 31226                                  fum30:	
 31227                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31228                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31229                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31230                                  
 31231                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31232                                  	mov     ax,es
 31233                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31234                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31235                                  	inc     ax
 31236                                  	mov     es,ax
 31237                                  	
 31238                                  	jmp	short fum10
 31239                                  
 31240                                  fumX:	pop	es
 31241                                  	pop	dx
 31242                                  	pop	cx
 31243                                  	pop	ax
 31244                                  	retn
 31245                                  
 31246                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31247                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31248                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31249                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31250                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31251                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31252                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31253                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31254                                  
 31255                                  UmbTest:
 31256                                  	push	ax
 31257                                  	push	bx
 31258                                  	push	ds
 31259                                  	push	es
 31260                                  
 31261                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 31262                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 31263                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 31264                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 31265                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 31266                                  
 31267                                  	pop	es
 31268                                  	pop	ds
 31269                                  	pop	bx
 31270                                  	pop	ax
 31271                                  	retn
 31272                                  
 31273                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31274                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31275                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31276                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31277                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31278                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31279                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31280                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31281                                  
 31282                                  WalkMem:
 31283                                  	push	ax ; ?
 31284                                  	push	bx ; ?
 31285                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31286                                  		   	
 31287                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31288                                  	int	21h
 31289                                  
 31290                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31291                                  	mov	es,ax
 31292                                  
 31293                                  ; ------------------------------
 31294                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31295                                  ; ------------------------------
 31296                                  
 31297                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31298                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 31299                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31300                                  
 31301                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31302                                  
 31303                                  	mov     bx,es
 31304                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31305                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31306                                  	inc     bx
 31307                                  	mov     es,bx
 31308                                  		
 31309                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31310                                  um20:	
 31311                                  	mov	ax,es
 31312                                  
 31313                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31314                                  
 31315                                  	pop	es ; ?
 31316                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 31317                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 31318                                  	retn
 31319                                  
 31320                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31321                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 31322                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31323                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31324                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31325                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31326                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31327                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31328                                  
 31329                                  hl_unlink:
 31330                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31331                                  
 31332                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 31333                                  	;
 31334                                  	;push	ds
 31335                                  	;push	cs
 31336                                  	;pop	ds
 31337                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 31338                                  	;pop	ds
 31339                                  
 31340                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 31341                                  
 31342                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31343                                  	int	21h
 31344                                  	retn
 31345                                  
 31346                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31347                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31348                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31349                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31350                                  
 31351                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 31352                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 31353                                  
 31354                                  ;   Modification log:
 31355                                  ;
 31356                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31357                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31358                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31359                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31360                                  
 31361                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31362                                  
 31363                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31364                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31365                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31366                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31367                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31368                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31369                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31370                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31371                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31372                                  
 31373                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31374                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31375                                  
 31376                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31377                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31378                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31379                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31380                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31381                                  ;    every command execution.
 31382                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31383                                  
 31384                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31385                                  	;
 31386                                  	;push	ds
 31387                                  	;push	cs
 31388                                  	;pop	ds
 31389                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31390                                  	;pop	ds	
 31391                                  
 31392                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31393                                  
 31394                                  	or	al,al
 31395                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31396                                  
 31397                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31398                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31399                                  	retn			; that.
 31400                                  uhu10:	
 31401                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31402                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31403                                  
 31404                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31405                                  	;
 31406                                  	;push	es
 31407                                  	;push	cs
 31408                                  	;pop	es
 31409                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31410                                  	;pop	ds	
 31411                                  
 31412                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31413                                  
 31414                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31415                                  
 31416                                  	pop	ax
 31417                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31418                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31419                                  	retn
 31420                                  
 31421                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31422                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31423                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31424                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31425                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31426                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31427                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31428                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31429                                  
 31430                                  he_unlink:
 31431                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31432                                  
 31433                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31434                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31435                                  
 31436                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31437                                  	int	21h
 31438                                  	retn
 31439                                  
 31440                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31441                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31442                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31443                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31444                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31445                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31446                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31447                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31448                                  
 31449                                  FreeUMBs:
 31450                                  	push	ax
 31451                                  	push	es
 31452                                  
 31453                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31454                                  	jc	short fusX
 31455                                  
 31456                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31457                                  fus10:	
 31458                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31459                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31460                                  	call	freeMCB
 31461                                  fus20:	   
 31462                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31463                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31464                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31465                                  
 31466                                  	mov	ax,es
 31467                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31468                                  	inc	ax
 31469                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31470                                  
 31471                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31472                                  fusX:	
 31473                                  	pop	es
 31474                                  	pop	ax
 31475                                  	retn
 31476                                  
 31477                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31478                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31479                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31480                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31481                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31482                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31483                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31484                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31485                                  
 31486                                  isHideMCB:
 31487                                  	;push	ax
 31488                                  
 31489                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31490                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31491                                  
 31492                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31493                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31494                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31495                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31496                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31497                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31498                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31499                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31500                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31501                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31502                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31503                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31504                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31505                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31506                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31507                                  ihm_x:	
 31508                                  	;pop	ax
 31509                                  	retn
 31510                                  
 31511                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31512                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31513                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31514                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31515                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31516                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31517                                  ; USES:     AX
 31518                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31519                                  
 31520                                  freeMCB:
 31521                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31522                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31523                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31524                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31525                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31526                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31527                                  	retn
 31528                                  
 31529                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31530                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31531                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31532                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31533                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31534                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31535                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31536                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31537                                  
 31538                                  HeadUmb:
 31539                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31540                                  
 31541                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31542                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31543                                  	;push	es
 31544                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31545                                  
 31546                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31547                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31548                                  
 31549                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31550                                  	int	21h
 31551                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31552                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31553                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31554                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31555                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31556                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31557                                  
 31558                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31559                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31560                                  xhu_e:	
 31561                                  	;stc
 31562                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31563                                  xhu_x:	
 31564                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31565                                  	;pop	es	
 31566                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31567                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31568                                  	retn
 31569                                  
 31570                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31571                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31572                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31573                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31574                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31575                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31576                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31577                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31578                                  
 31579                                  linkumb:
 31580                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31581                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31582                                  
 31583                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31584                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31585                                  
 31586                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31587                                  	mov	bx,1
 31588                                  	int	21h
 31589                                  lumbX:
 31590                                  	retn
 31591                                  
 31592                                  %endif
 31593                                  
 31594                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31595                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)

 31601                                  
 31602                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31603                                  ;
 31604                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31605                                  ;
 31606                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31607                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31608                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31609                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31610                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31611                                  ;
 31612                                  ;	Output : none
 31613                                  ;
 31614                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31615                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31616                                  ;
 31617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31618                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31619                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31620                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31621                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31622                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31623                                  
 31624                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31625                                  InitDevLoad:
 31626                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31627                                  	; ds = cs
 31628 00002773 803E[851E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31629                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31630                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31631 00002778 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31632                                  
 31633                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31634                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31635                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31636                                  ;
 31637                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31638                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31639                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31640                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31641                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31642                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31643                                  ;
 31644                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31645                                  ;
 31646                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31647                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31648                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31649                                  ;	pushf
 31650                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31651                                  ;	popf
 31652                                  ;
 31653                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31654                                  ;
 31655                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31656                                  
 31657                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31658                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31659                                  InitForConv:
 31660                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31661                                  	; ds = cs
 31662 0000277A E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31663                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31664 0000277D 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31665 0000277F E83E04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31666 00002782 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31667 00002785 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31668                                  					;  in low memory
 31669                                  InitForHi:
 31670                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31671                                  	; ds = cs
 31672                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31673                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31674                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31675 00002787 A1[7B1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31676 0000278A 8B16[771E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31677 0000278E 0316[791E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31678 00002792 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31679                                  
 31680                                  InitForLo:
 31681                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31682                                  	; ds = cs
 31683                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31684 00002794 C606[851E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31685                                  initforlo_x:
 31686                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31687                                  	; ds = cs
 31688                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31689                                  					;  we are loading low
 31690                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31691                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31692 00002799 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31693 0000279C 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31694                                  idl1:
 31695 000027A0 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31696                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31697                                  	; ds = cs
 31698                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31699                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31700                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31701                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31702 000027A3 A3[6A1E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31703 000027A6 8916[6C1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31704 000027AA C706[6E1E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31705 000027B0 A3[701E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31706 000027B3 C3                      	retn
 31707                                  
 31708                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31709                                  ;
 31710                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31711                                  ;
 31712                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31713                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31714                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31715                                  ;		   current UMB
 31716                                  ;
 31717                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31718                                  
 31719                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31720                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31721                                  	; ds = cs
 31722                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31723                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31724                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31725 000027B4 A1[791E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31726 000027B7 0306[771E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31727 000027BB 2B06[7B1E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31728                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31729                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31730                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31731                                  	;stc
 31732                                  	;retn
 31733                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31734 000027BF 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31735 000027C2 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31736                                  spcinumb1:
 31737 000027C4 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31738                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31739                                  	; ds = cs
 31740 000027C5 3B06[681E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31741                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31742                                  spcinumb2:
 31743 000027C9 C3                      	retn
 31744                                  
 31745                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31746                                  ;
 31747                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31748                                  ;
 31749                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31750                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31751                                  ;
 31752                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31753                                  
 31754                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31755                                  ;
 31756                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31757                                  ;	push	ds
 31758                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31759                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31760                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31761                                  ;	pop	ds
 31762                                  ;
 31763                                  ;	inc	ax
 31764                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31765                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31766                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31767                                  ;	retn
 31768                                  
 31769                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31770                                  ;
 31771                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31772                                  ;
 31773                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31774                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31775                                  ;		 the device.
 31776                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31777                                  ;
 31778                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31779                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31780                                  ;	UMB.
 31781                                  ;
 31782                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31783                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31784                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31785                                  ;
 31786                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31787                                  
 31788                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31789                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31790                                  
 31791                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31792                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31793                                  	; ds = cs
 31794 000027CA BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31795 000027CD B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31796 000027D0 CD21                    	int	21h
 31797                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31798                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31799                                  
 31800 000027D2 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31801                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 31802                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31803 000027D4 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 31804                                  
 31805 000027D6 4B                      	dec	bx
 31806                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31807                                  	; ds = cs
 31808 000027D7 391E[681E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31809                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31810 000027DB 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31811                                  
 31812 000027DD 43                      	inc	bx
 31813                                  
 31814 000027DE B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31815 000027E1 CD21                    	int	21h
 31816 000027E3 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31817                                  
 31818                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31819                                  	;dec	ax
 31820                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31821                                  	;
 31822                                  PrepareMark:
 31823 000027E5 1E                      	push	ds
 31824 000027E6 48                      	dec	ax
 31825 000027E7 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31826 000027E9 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31827 000027EF C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31828 000027F5 40                      	inc	ax
 31829 000027F6 1F                      	pop	ds
 31830                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31831                                  	; ds = cs
 31832                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31833                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31834                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31835                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 31836 000027F7 891E[791E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31837 000027FB A3[771E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31838 000027FE A3[7B1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31839                                  	;
 31840                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31841                                  	; cf=0
 31842                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31843 00002801 C3                      	retn
 31844                                  
 31845                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31846                                  %if 1
 31847                                  gufd_err:
 31848 00002802 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 31849                                  gufd_error:
 31850 00002804 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31851 00002806 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 31852 00002807 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 31853                                  %endif
 31854                                  
 31855                                  ; 09/09/2023
 31856                                  %if 0
 31857                                  gufd_err:
 31858                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31859                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31860                                  	; ds = cs
 31861                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31862                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31863                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31864                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31865                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31866                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31867                                  	stc
 31868                                  	retn
 31869                                  %endif

 31871                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31872                                  ;
 31873                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31874                                  ;
 31875                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31876                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31877                                  ;
 31878                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31879                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31880                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31881                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31882                                  ;
 31883                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31884                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31885                                  ;
 31886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31887                                  
 31888                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31889                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31890                                  
 31891                                  DevSetMark:
 31892 00002809 06                      	push	es
 31893 0000280A 57                      	push	di
 31894 0000280B 1E                      	push	ds
 31895 0000280C 56                      	push	si
 31896 0000280D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31897 0000280F 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31898 00002815 40                      	inc	ax
 31899 00002816 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31900                                  
 31901                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31902                                  
 31903 0000281A 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31904                                  	
 31905                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31906                                  	; ds = cs
 31907                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31908 0000281B C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 31909                                  
 31910 0000281F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31911 00002821 FC                      	cld
 31912                                  dsm_again:
 31913 00002822 AC                      	lodsb
 31914 00002823 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31915 00002825 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31916 00002827 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31917 00002829 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31918                                  isit_slash:
 31919 0000282B 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31920 0000282D 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31921 0000282F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31922 00002831 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31923                                  isit_null:
 31924 00002833 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31925 00002835 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31926 00002837 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31927                                  
 31928 00002839 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31929 0000283C B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31930                                  dsm_next_char:
 31931 0000283F AC                      	lodsb
 31932 00002840 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31933 00002842 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31934 00002844 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31935 00002846 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31936 00002848 AA                      	stosb
 31937 00002849 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31938                                  blankout:
 31939 0000284B E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31940 0000284D B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31941 0000284F F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31942                                  dsm_exit:
 31943 00002851 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31944 00002852 5E                      	pop	si
 31945 00002853 1F                      	pop	ds
 31946 00002854 5F                      	pop	di
 31947 00002855 07                      	pop	es
 31948 00002856 C3                      	retn
 31949                                  
 31950                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31951                                  ;
 31952                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31953                                  ;
 31954                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31955                                  ;
 31956                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31957                                  ;
 31958                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31959                                  ;	in DevSize
 31960                                  ;
 31961                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31962                                  
 31963                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31964                                  SizeDevice:
 31965                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31966                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31967 00002857 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31968 00002858 06                      	push	es
 31969 00002859 1F                      	pop	ds
 31970 0000285A 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31971 0000285C B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31972 0000285F CD21                    	int	21h
 31973 00002861 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31974                                  
 31975 00002863 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31976 00002865 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31977 00002868 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31978 0000286A 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31979 0000286C CD21                    	int	21h
 31980 0000286E 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31981 00002870 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31982 00002873 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31983 00002876 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31984 0000287A 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31985 0000287C 2EC706[681E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31986                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31987 00002883 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31988                                  szdev1:
 31989 00002885 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31990 00002887 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31991 00002889 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31992 0000288B D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31993 0000288D 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31994                                  	;
 31995                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31996 0000288F 2E3B06[861E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31997                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31998                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31999 00002894 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 32000                                  
 32001 00002896 2EA1[861E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32002                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32003 0000289A F8                      	clc
 32004                                  szdev2:
 32005 0000289B 2EA3[681E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 32006                                  
 32007                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32008                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32009                                  	; cf=0
 32010                                  	;clc
 32011                                  sd_close:
 32012 0000289F 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 32013                                  					;  carry flag
 32014 000028A0 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 32015 000028A3 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 32016 000028A5 9D                      	popf
 32017                                  sd_err:
 32018                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32019                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32020 000028A6 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32021 000028A7 C3                      	retn
 32022                                  
 32023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32024                                  ;
 32025                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 32026                                  ;
 32027                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 32028                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 32029                                  ;
 32030                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 32031                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 32032                                  ;
 32033                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 32034                                  ;
 32035                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32036                                  
 32037                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32038                                  ExecDev:
 32039 000028A8 2E8B1E[6A1E]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]

 32041                                  					;  block for exec with
 32042                                  					;  Load address
 32043 000028B2 2E891E[831E]            	mov	[cs:DevExecReloc],bx
 32044 000028B7 8CCB                    	mov	bx,cs
 32045 000028B9 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32046 000028BB BB[811E]                	mov	bx,DevExecAddr		;es:bx points to parameters
 32047                                  	;mov	al,3	; (load program only)
 32048                                  	;mov	ah,EXEC ; 4Bh
 32049                                  	; 04/07/2023
 32050 000028BE B8034B                  	mov	ax,(EXEC<<8)|03h
 32051 000028C1 CD21                    	int	21h			;load in the device driver
 32052                                   		; DOS - 2+ - LOAD OR EXECUTE (EXEC)
 32053                                  		; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename
 32054                                  		; ES:BX -> parameter block
 32055                                  		; AL = subfunction 
 32056 000028C3 C3                      	retn

 32083                                  ;
 32084                                  ; procedure : RemoveNull
 32085                                  ;
 32086                                  ;	Input : ES:SI points to a null terminated string
 32087                                  ;
 32088                                  ;	Output : none
 32089                                  ;
 32090                                  ;	Replaces the null at the end of a string with blank
 32091                                  ;
 32092                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32093                                  
 32094                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32095                                  	; (SYSINIT:2CCEh)
 32096                                  RemoveNull:
 32097                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32098                                  	; ds = cs
 32099                                  rn_next:
 32100 000028C4 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32101 000028C7 08DB                    	or	bl,bl			; null ?
 32102 000028C9 7403                    	jz	short rn_gotnull
 32103 000028CB 46                      	inc	si			; advance the pointer
 32104 000028CC EBF6                    	jmp	short rn_next
 32105                                  rn_gotnull:
 32106                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32107 000028CE 8A1E[9A1E]              	mov	bl,[DevSavedDelim]
 32108                                  	;mov	bl,[cs:DevSavedDelim]
 32109 000028D2 26881C                  	mov	[es:si],bl		; replace null with blank
 32110                                  	; 02/11/2022

 32380                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32381                                  ;
 32382                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32383                                  ;
 32384                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32385                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32386                                  ;
 32387                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32388                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32389                                  ;
 32390                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32391                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32392                                  ;
 32393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32394                                  
 32395                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32396                                  
 32397                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32398                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32399                                  GetHexNum:
 32400 0000298A 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32401 0000298C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32402                                  ghn_next:
 32403 0000298E 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32404 00002991 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32405 00002994 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32406 00002996 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32407 00002999 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32408 0000299B 50                      	push	ax
 32409 0000299C 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32410 0000299E E82206                  	call	delim
 32411 000029A1 58                      	pop	ax
 32412                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32413 000029A2 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 32414 000029A5 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32415 000029A7 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32416                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32417                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32418 000029AA 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32419                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32420                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32421                                  ghn_shift1:
 32422 000029AC D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32423 000029AE D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32424 000029B0 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32425 000029B2 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32426 000029B4 46                      	inc	si
 32427 000029B5 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32428                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32429 000029B7 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32430 000029BA 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32431 000029BD F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32432 000029C1 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32433                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32434                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32435                                  ghn_shift2:
 32436 000029C3 F8                      	clc
 32437 000029C4 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32438 000029C6 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32439 000029C8 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32440 000029CA F8                      	clc
 32441 000029CB C3                      	retn
 32442                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32443                                  ghn_err:
 32444                                  gnib_err:
 32445 000029CC F9                      	stc
 32446                                  ghn_ret:
 32447                                  gnib_ret:
 32448 000029CD C3                      	retn

 32450                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32451                                  ;
 32452                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32453                                  ;
 32454                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32455                                  ;
 32456                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 32457                                  ;
 32458                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32459                                  ;
 32460                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32461                                  
 32462                                  GetNibble:
 32463 000029CE 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 32464                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32465                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32466 000029D1 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32467 000029D3 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32468 000029D6 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32469 000029D8 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32470 000029DB C3                      	retn
 32471                                  is_it_hex:
 32472 000029DC 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 32473                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32474                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32475 000029DF 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32476 000029E1 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32477 000029E4 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32478 000029E6 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 32479 000029E9 C3                      	retn
 32480                                  
 32481                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32482                                  ;gnib_err:
 32483                                  ;	stc
 32484                                  ;gnib_ret:
 32485                                  ;	retn
