 32500                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32501                                  ;
 32502                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32503                                  ;
 32504                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32505                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32506                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32507                                  ;			; DS = data
 32508                                  ;
 32509                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32510                                  ;
 32511                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32512                                  ;
 32513                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32514                                  
 32515                                  umb_insert:
 32516 000029EA 1E                      	push	ds
 32517                                  
 32518                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32519                                  	; ds = cs
 32520                                  
 32521                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32522 000029EB 8E1E[941E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32523                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32524 000029EF 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32525 000029F3 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32526 000029F5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32527                                  ui_next:
 32528 000029F7 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32529                                  					;    new block
 32530 000029F9 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32531                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32532                                  					;    last
 32533 000029FB 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32534 00002A01 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32535                                  					; N: get next block
 32536 00002A03 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32537                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32538 00002A05 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32539 00002A08 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32540                                  
 32541                                  ui_insert:
 32542 00002A0A 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32543 00002A0C 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32544                                  
 32545 00002A0D 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32546 00002A0F F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32547                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32548 00002A11 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32549                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32550 00002A16 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32551                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32552 00002A1C 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32553                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32554 00002A20 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32555                                  
 32556                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32557                                  
 32558 00002A26 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32559 00002A28 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32560 00002A2E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32561                                  					; mark as free
 32562 00002A35 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32563                                  					; start & end of new block
 32564 00002A38 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32565                                  
 32566                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32567                                  	
 32568 00002A3D 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32569 00002A3F 43                      	inc	bx
 32570 00002A40 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32571 00002A42 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32572                                  
 32573                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32574                                  					; this block
 32575 00002A43 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32576                                  	
 32577 00002A45 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32578 00002A4B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32579 00002A52 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32580 00002A56 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32581                                  
 32582 00002A5D EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32583                                  
 32584                                  ui_append:
 32585                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32586 00002A5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32587 00002A64 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32588                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32589                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32590                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32591 00002A6A 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32592                                  
 32593 00002A70 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32594 00002A72 40                      	inc	ax
 32595 00002A73 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32596                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32597 00002A75 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32598                                  
 32599 00002A77 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32600                                  
 32601 00002A79 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32602 00002A7F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32603 00002A86 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32604 00002A8A 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32605                                  
 32606                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32607 00002A91 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32608 00002A93 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32609 00002A99 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32610                                  					; mark as free
 32611 00002AA0 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32612 00002AA1 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32613                                  ui_done:
 32614                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32615 00002AA6 1F                      	pop	ds
 32616                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32617                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32618                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 32619 00002AA7 C3                      	retn
 32620

 32622                                  ;
 32623                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 32624                                  ;
 32625                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 32626                                  ;
 32627                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32628                                  
 32629                                  AllocUMB:
 32630                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32631                                  	; ds = cs
 32632 00002AA8 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 32633 00002AAB 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 32634                                  au_next:
 32635 00002AAD E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 32636 00002AB0 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 32637 00002AB2 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 32638 00002AB5 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 32639                                  au_coalesce:
 32640                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32641                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 32642                                  ;au_exit:
 32643                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 32644                                  ;	; ds = cs
 32645                                  ;	retn
 32646                                  
 32647                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32648                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 32649                                  
 32650                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32651                                  
 32652                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32653                                  ;
 32654                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32655                                  ;
 32656                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32657                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32658                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32659                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32660                                  ;
 32661                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32662                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32663                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32664                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32665                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32666                                  ;
 32667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32668                                  
 32669                                  umb_coalesce:
 32670                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32671                                  	; ds = cs
 32672 00002AB7 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32673                                  
 32674 00002AB8 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32675                                  
 32676                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32677                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32678 00002ABA 8E06[941E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32679 00002ABE 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32680                                  uc_nextfree:
 32681 00002AC3 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32682 00002AC5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32683                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32684 00002AC7 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32685 00002ACC 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32686                                  					; N: get next arena
 32687 00002ACE E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32688 00002AD1 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32689 00002AD3 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32690                                  uc_again:
 32691 00002AD5 E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32692 00002AD8 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32693                                  uc_check:
 32694 00002ADA 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32695 00002ADF 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32696                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32697 00002AE1 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32698 00002AE6 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32699                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32700 00002AE7 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32701 00002AEB 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32702 00002AEE 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32703 00002AF0 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32704                                  
 32705                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32706                                  ;uc_done:
 32707                                  	;retn
 32708                                  
 32709                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32710                                  ;
 32711                                  ; procedure : InitAllocUMB
 32712                                  ;
 32713                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32714                                  
 32715                                  InitAllocUMB:
 32716                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32717                                  	; ds = cs
 32718 00002AF2 E827DF                  	call	IsXMSLoaded
 32719 00002AF5 7527                    	jnz	short iau_err		; quit on no XMS driver
 32720 00002AF7 B452                    	mov	ah,52h
 32721 00002AF9 CD21                    	int	21h			; get DOS DATA seg
 32722                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32723                                  	; ds = cs
 32724                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 32725 00002AFB 8C06[941E]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 32726 00002AFF B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 32727 00002B02 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 32728                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 32729                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 32730 00002B04 891E[7D1E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 32731 00002B08 8C06[7F1E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 32732                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32733 00002B0C 803E[931E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 32734                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 32735                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it
 32736                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32737 00002B11 770A                    	ja	short ia_1 ; cf=0
 32738 00002B13 E83900                  	call	LinkFirstUMB		; else link the first UMB
 32739                                  	;jc	short iau_err
 32740                                  	; 12/12/2022

 32756                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32757                                  ;
 32758                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32759                                  ;
 32760                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32761                                  ;
 32762                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32763                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32764                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32765                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32766                                  ;				NC
 32767                                  ;			  else 
 32768                                  ;				CY
 32769                                  ;
 32770                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32771                                  ;
 32772                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32773                                  
 32774                                  umb_allocate:
 32775                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32776                                  	; ds = cs
 32777 00002B20 50                      	push	ax
 32778 00002B21 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32779 00002B23 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32780                                  					;   possible
 32781                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32782 00002B26 FF1E[7D1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32783                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32784                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32785                                  					; the largest UMB
 32786 00002B2A 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32787 00002B2C 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 32788                                  	
 32789 00002B2E B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32790                                  
 32791                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32792 00002B30 FF1E[7D1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32793                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32794                                  
 32795 00002B34 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32796                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32797                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32798 00002B37 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 32799                                  ua_err:
 32800 00002B39 F9                      	stc	
 32801                                  
 32802                                  	;clc
 32803                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32804                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32805                                  	; cf=0
 32806                                  	;clc 
 32807                                  ua_done:
 32808 00002B3A 58                      	pop	ax
 32809 00002B3B C3                      	retn
 32810                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32811                                  ;ua_err:
 32812                                  	;stc
 32813                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 32814                                  
 32815                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32816                                  
 32817                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32818                                  ;
 32819                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32820                                  ;
 32821                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32822                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32823                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32824                                  ;
 32825                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32826                                  
 32827                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32828                                  get_next:
 32829 00002B3C 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32830 00002B41 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32831                                  _get_next_:
 32832 00002B43 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32833 00002B45 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32834 00002B49 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32835 00002B4A 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32836                                  	;clc
 32837                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32838                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32839                                  	; cf=0
 32840                                  	;clc
 32841 00002B4C C3                      	retn
 32842                                  gn_err:
 32843 00002B4D F9                      	stc
 32844                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32845                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32846 00002B4E C3                      	retn

 32848                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32849                                  ;
 32850                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32851                                  ;
 32852                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32853                                  
 32854                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32855                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32856                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32857                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32858                                  	; ds = cs
 32859 00002B4F E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 32860 00002B52 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32861                                  
 32862                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32863                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32864                                  
 32865                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32866                                  	; ds = cs
 32867                                  
 32868 00002B54 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32869 00002B56 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32870 00002B58 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32871                                  
 32872 00002B5A 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32873 00002B5C 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32874                                  
 32875 00002B5E F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32876                                  
 32877                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32878                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32879 00002B60 49                      	dec	cx
 32880 00002B61 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32881                                  	
 32882 00002B63 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32883 00002B69 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32884                                  					
 32885 00002B70 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32886 00002B74 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32887                                  
 32888                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32889                                  
 32890 00002B7B 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32891 00002B7D 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32892 00002B83 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32893                                  					; mark as free 
 32894 00002B8A 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32895 00002B8B 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32896                                  
 32897                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32898                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32899 00002B90 8E06[941E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32900 00002B94 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32901 00002B97 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32902                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32903                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32904                                  
 32905                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32906                                  
 32907 00002B9A BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32908 00002B9D 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32909 00002BA0 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32910                                  ;scan_next
 32911                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32912                                  scannext:
 32913 00002BA2 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32914 00002BA6 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32915                                  	
 32916 00002BA8 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32917 00002BAA 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32918 00002BAF 40                      	inc	ax
 32919 00002BB0 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32920                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32921                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32922 00002BB2 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32923                                  got_last:
 32924                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32925                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32926 00002BB4 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32927                                  
 32928 00002BB9 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32929                                  	;clc
 32930                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32931                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32932                                  	; cf=0
 32933                                  	;clc
 32934 00002BBF C3                      	retn
 32935                                  
 32936                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32937                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32938                                  ;	;stc
 32939                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32940                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32941                                  ;	; cf=1
 32942                                  ;	;stc
 32943                                  ;	retn
 32944                                  
 32945                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32946                                  ;
 32947                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32948                                  ;
 32949                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32950                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32951                                  ;
 32952                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32953                                  
 32954                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32955                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32956                                  	; ds = cs
 32957 00002BC0 833E[771E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32958                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32959 00002BC5 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32960 00002BC7 06                      	push	es
 32961 00002BC8 53                      	push	bx
 32962                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32963                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32964                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32965                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32966 00002BC9 8B1E[7B1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32967 00002BCD 2B1E[771E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32968 00002BD1 8E06[771E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32969                                  	
 32970 00002BD5 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32971 00002BD8 CD21                    	int	21h
 32972                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32973                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32974                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32975 00002BDA 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32976 00002BDC 48                      	dec	ax
 32977 00002BDD 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32978 00002BDF 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32979 00002BE6 5B                      	pop	bx
 32980 00002BE7 07                      	pop	es
 32981                                  su_exit:
 32982 00002BE8 C3                      	retn

 32986                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 32987                                  ;
 32988                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 32989                                  ;
 32990                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32991                                  
 32992                                  UnlinkUMB:
 32993                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32994                                  	; ds = cs
 32995 00002BE9 1E                      	push	ds
 32996 00002BEA 06                      	push	es
 32997                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32998 00002BEB 803E[931E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32999                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 33000 00002BF0 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 33001                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33002 00002BF2 8E06[941E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33003                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 33004 00002BF6 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33005 00002BFB 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 33006                                  ulu_next:
 33007 00002C00 E839FF                  	call	get_next
 33008 00002C03 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 33009 00002C05 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 33010 00002C07 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 33011 00002C09 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33012 00002C0B EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 33013                                  ulu_found:
 33014                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 33015 00002C0D C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33016                                  ulu_x:
 33017 00002C12 07                      	pop	es
 33018 00002C13 1F                      	pop	ds
 33019 00002C14 C3                      	retn

 33021                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33022                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33023                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33024                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33025                                  
 33026                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33027                                  ;
 33028                                  ; Summary:
 33029                                  ;
 33030                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33031                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33032                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33033                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33034                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33035                                  ;
 33036                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33037                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33038                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33039                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33040                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33041                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33042                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33043                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33044                                  ;
 33045                                  ; Example:
 33046                                  ;
 33047                                  ;   [menu]
 33048                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33049                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33050                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33051                                  ;
 33052                                  ;   [network]
 33053                                  ;   include misc
 33054                                  ;   device=foo
 33055                                  ;
 33056                                  ;   [misc]
 33057                                  ;   device=bar
 33058                                  ;   include alternate
 33059                                  ;
 33060                                  ;   [alternate]
 33061                                  ;   device=tar
 33062                                  ;
 33063                                  ;
 33064                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33065                                  ;
 33066                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33067                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33068                                  ;
 33069                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33070                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33071                                  ;   following order:
 33072                                  ;
 33073                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33074                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33075                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33076                                  ;
 33077                                  
 33078                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33079                                  
 33080                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33081                                  
 33082                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33083                                  
 33084                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33085                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33086                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33087                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33088                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33089                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33090                                  
 33091                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33092                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33093                                  
 33094                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33095                                  
 33096                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33097                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 33098                                  
 33099 00002C15 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 33100

 33102                                  ;
 33103                                  ; procedure : setparms
 33104                                  ;
 33105                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 33106                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 33107                                  ;
 33108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33109                                  
 33110                                  setparms:
 33111 00002C16 1E                      	push	ds
 33112 00002C17 50                      	push	ax
 33113 00002C18 53                      	push	bx
 33114 00002C19 51                      	push	cx
 33115 00002C1A 52                      	push	dx
 33116                                  
 33117 00002C1B 0E                      	push	cs
 33118 00002C1C 1F                      	pop	ds
 33119                                  
 33120 00002C1D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33121 00002C1F 8A1E[9F35]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 33122                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33123 00002C23 43                      	inc	bx
 33124                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 33125                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 33126 00002C24 BA[7734]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 33127                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 33128                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 33129                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33130 00002C27 B80D44                  	mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8)|GENERIC_IOCTL
 33131                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8

 33289                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and

 33558                                  ;
 33559                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33560                                  ;
 33561                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33562                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33563                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33564                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33565                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33566                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33567                                  ;
 33568                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33569                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33570                                  ;
 33571                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33572                                  ;
 33573                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33574                                  
 33575                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33576                                  
 33577                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33578                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33579                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33580                                  	; ds = cs
 33581                                  	
 33582 00002D2C 06                      	push	es
 33583                                  
 33584 00002D2D 0E                      	push	cs
 33585 00002D2E 07                      	pop	es
 33586                                  
 33587 00002D2F 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33588 00002D31 8A1E[7834]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33589 00002D35 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33590 00002D38 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33591

 33593                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33594                                  got_80:

 33659                                  
 33660                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33661                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33662                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33663                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33664                                  
 33665                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33666                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33667                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.

 33675

 34081 00002EEB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 34082 00002EED 75F9                    	jne	short get_cmt_end	; skip it.
 34083                                  end_commd_line_brdg: 
 34084 00002EEF E9DAFE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		; else jmp to end_commd_line
 34085                                  
 34086                                  org_put_zero:				; make the filename in front of
 34087 00002EF2 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		;  the comment string to be an asciiz.
 34088 00002EF6 47                      	inc	di
 34089 00002EF7 E9D2FE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		;  (maybe null if device=/*)
 34090                                  
 34091                                  end_file_slash: 			; al = "/" option char.
 34092 00002EFA 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		; make a filename an asciiz
 34093 00002EFE 47                      	inc	di			; and
 34094 00002EFF AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.
 34095 00002F00 EB1A                    	jmp	short org5		; continue with the rest of the line
 34096                                  
 34097                                  end_copy_file:
 34098 00002F02 26C645FF00              	mov	byte [es:di-1],0	; make it an asciiz and handle the next char.
 34099 00002F07 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 34100 00002F09 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34101 00002F0B EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 34102                                  
 34103                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 34104 00002F0D E87D00                  	call	skip_comment
 34105 00002F10 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34106                                  
 34107 00002F12 E86200                  	call	get2
 34108 00002F15 E8B300                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 34109 00002F18 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 34110 00002F1A EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 34111                                  
 34112                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 34113 00002F1C E86E00                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 34114 00002F1F 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34115 00002F21 E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 34116                                  
 34117                                  org51:
 34118 00002F24 AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 34119 00002F25 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 34120 00002F27 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 34121 00002F29 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 34122 00002F2B 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 34123                                  					; M051 - Start
 34124                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34125                                  	; ds = cs
 34126 00002F2D 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 34127                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 34128 00002F32 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 34129 00002F34 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 34130 00002F36 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 34131 00002F38 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 34132 00002F3A 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 34133 00002F3C 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 34134 00002F41 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 34135 00002F42 FE06[152C]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 34136                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 34137                                  					; inserted
 34138 00002F46 EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 34139                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 34140                                  
 34141 00002F48 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 34142 00002F4A 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 34143 00002F4C EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 34144                                  
 34145                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 34146                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34147                                  	; ds = cs
 34148 00002F4E 803E[152C]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 34149                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 34150 00002F53 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 34151 00002F55 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 34152 00002F5A AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 34153                                  					; M051 - End
 34154                                  org1_brdg:
 34155 00002F5B C606[152C]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 34156                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 34157                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 34158 00002F60 E982FE                  	jmp	org1
 34159                                  
 34160                                  at_quote:
 34161 00002F63 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34162                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 34163 00002F68 7407                    	je	short up_level
 34164                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 34165 00002F6A C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 34166 00002F6F EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 34167                                  
 34168                                  up_level:
 34169                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 34170 00002F71 FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 34171 00002F75 EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 34172                                  
 34173                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34174                                  ;
 34175                                  ; procedure : get2
 34176                                  ;
 34177                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34178                                  
 34179                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34180                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 34181                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34182                                  get2:
 34183 00002F77 E304                    	jcxz	noget
 34184                                  	;
 34185                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34186                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 34187                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34188 00002F79 26                      	es	
 34189 00002F7A AC                      	lodsb
 34190                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 34191                                  	;inc	si
 34192                                  	;
 34193 00002F7B 49                      	dec	cx
 34194 00002F7C C3                      	retn
 34195                                  noget:
 34196 00002F7D 59                      	pop	cx
 34197                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34198                                  	; ds = cs
 34199                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 34200                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 34201 00002F7E 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 34202 00002F82 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 34203 00002F86 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 34204                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 34205 00002F88 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 34206                                  
 34207                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34208                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 34209                                  ;;	retn
 34210                                  ;;else
 34211                                  ;
 34212                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 34213                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 34214                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 34215                                  ;
 34216                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 34217                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 34218                                  ;;endif
 34219                                  
 34220                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34221 00002F8C C3                      	retn
 34222                                  
 34223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34224                                  ;
 34225                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 34226                                  ;
 34227                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 34228                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 34229                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 34230                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 34231                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 34232                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 34233                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 34234                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 34235                                  ;
 34236                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34237                                  
 34238                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34239                                  
 34240                                  skip_comment:
 34241 00002F8D E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 34242                                  
 34243                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34244                                  	; ds = cs	
 34245                                  
 34246 00002F8F 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34247                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 34248 00002F94 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 34249                                  
 34250 00002F96 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 34251                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 34252 00002F9B 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 34253                                  
 34254 00002F9D 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34255                                  	
 34256 00002FA0 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 34257                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 34258 00002FA4 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 34259                                  
 34260 00002FA6 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 34261                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 34262 00002FAB 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34263                                  
 34264 00002FAD 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 34265                                  	
 34266 00002FB1 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 34267                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34268 00002FB5 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 34269                                  skip_cmmt:
 34270 00002FB7 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 34271 00002FB9 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34272 00002FBC 46                      	inc	si
 34273 00002FBD 49                      	dec	cx
 34274 00002FBE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 34275 00002FC0 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34276                                  no_commt:
 34277 00002FC2 C3                      	retn
 34278                                  
 34279                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34280                                  %if 0
 34281                                  
 34282                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34283                                  
 34284                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34285                                  ;
 34286                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 34287                                  ;
 34288                                  ;   INPUT
 34289                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34290                                  ;
 34291                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34292                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 34293                                  ;
 34294                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34295                                  ;       All
 34296                                  ;
 34297                                  ;   HISTORY
 34298                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34299                                  ;
 34300                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34301                                  
 34302                                  kbd_read:
 34303                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 34304                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 34305                                  
 34306                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 34307                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 34308                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 34309                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 34310                                  kbd_loop:
 34311                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 34312                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 34313                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 34314                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34315                                          int     16h             ;
 34316                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34317                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 34318                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 34319                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 34320                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34321                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 34322                                  
 34323                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 34324                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 34325                                  kbd_loopdone:
 34326                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 34327                                  kbd_nodelay:
 34328                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 34329                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34330                                          int     16h             ;
 34331                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34332                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 34333                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 34334                                          inc     bx
 34335                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 34336                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34337                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 34338                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 34339                                          int     16h             ;
 34340                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 34341                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 34342                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 34343                                  
 34344                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 34345                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 34346                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 34347                                  	
 34348                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34349                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 34350                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 34351                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 34352                                          call    print
 34353                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 34354                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 34355                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 34356                                  kbd_notf5:
 34357                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 34358                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 34359                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 34360                                  
 34361                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34362                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 34363                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 34364                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 34365                                          call    print           ;
 34366                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 34367                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 34368                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 34369                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 34370                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 34371                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 34372                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 34373                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 34374                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 34375                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 34376                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 34377                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 34378                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 34379                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 34380                                          retn			;
 34381                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 34382                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 34383                                          retn			;
 34384                                  
 34385                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34386                                  ;
 34387                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 34388                                  ;
 34389                                  ;   INPUT
 34390                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 34391                                  ;
 34392                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34393                                  ;       None
 34394                                  ;
 34395                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34396                                  ;       None
 34397                                  ;
 34398                                  ;   HISTORY
 34399                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34400                                  ;
 34401                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34402                                  
 34403                                  set_numlock:
 34404                                          push    ax
 34405                                          push    ds
 34406                                          sub     ax,ax
 34407                                          mov     ds,ax
 34408                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 34409                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 34410                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 34411                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 34412                                          jmp     short set_done
 34413                                  not_off:
 34414                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34415                                          stc
 34416                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 34417                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 34418                                  set_done:
 34419                                          pop     ds
 34420                                          pop     ax
 34421                                          retn
 34422                                  
 34423                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34424                                  
 34425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34426                                  ;
 34427                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34428                                  ;
 34429                                  ;   INPUT
 34430                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34431                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34432                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34433                                  ;
 34434                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34435                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34436                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34437                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34438                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34439                                  ;
 34440                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34441                                  ;       All
 34442                                  ;
 34443                                  ;   NOTES
 34444                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34445                                  ;
 34446                                  ;   HISTORY
 34447                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34448                                  ;
 34449                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34450                                  
 34451                                  menu_check:
 34452                                  
 34453                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 34454                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 34455                                  
 34456                                          push    cx              ;
 34457                                          push    si              ;
 34458                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 34459                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 34460                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34461                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 34462                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34463                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 34464                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 34465                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34466                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 34467                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34468                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 34469                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 34470                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 34471                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 34472                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 34473                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34474                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 34475                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 34476                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 34477                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 34478                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 34479                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 34480                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 34481                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 34482                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 34483                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 34484                                          call    get_char        ;
 34485                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 34486                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 34487                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34488                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34489                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34490                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34491                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34492                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34493                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34494                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34495                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34496                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34497                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34498                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34499                                          pop     si              ;
 34500                                          pop     cx              ;
 34501                                  
 34502                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34503                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34504                                  
 34505                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34506                                          jnz	short menu_search
 34507                                  ;
 34508                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34509                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34510                                  ;
 34511                                          call    kbd_read
 34512                                          jnc	short menu_search
 34513                                          jmp	menu_abort
 34514                                  
 34515                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34516                                  
 34517                                  menu_search:
 34518                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34519                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 34520                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34521                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 34522                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34523                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34524                                  
 34525                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34526                                  
 34527                                  menu_color:
 34528                                          push    cx              ;
 34529                                          push    dx              ;
 34530                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34531                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34532                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34533                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34534                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34535                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34536                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34537                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34538                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34539                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34540                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34541                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34542                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34543                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 34544                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34545                                  check_color:                    ;
 34546                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34547                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 34548                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34549                                  set_color:
 34550                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34551                                          pop     dx              ;
 34552                                          pop     cx              ;
 34553                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34554                                  
 34555                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34556                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34557                                  
 34558                                  menu_found:
 34559                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34560                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34561                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34562                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34563                                  
 34564                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34565                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34566                                  
 34567                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34568                                  
 34569                                  menu_process:
 34570                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34571                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34572                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34573                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34574                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34575                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34576                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34577                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34578                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34579                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34580                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34581                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34582                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34583                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34584                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 34585                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34586                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34587                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34588                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34589                                          stc                     ;
 34590                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34591                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34592                                  menu_numlock:
 34593                                          call    set_numlock
 34594                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34595                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34596                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34597                                  
 34598                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34599                                  
 34600                                  menu_default:
