 35631                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35632                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35633                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35634                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35635                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35636                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35637                                  print1: 
 35638                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35639                                  print2: 
 35640                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35641                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35642                                  to_input_key:
 35643                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35644                                  not_down:
 35645                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35646                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35647                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35648                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35649                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35650                                          call    show_status     ;
 35651                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35652                                  not_f8:
 35653                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35654                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35655                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35656                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35657                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35658                                  
 35659                                  normal_key:
 35660                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35661                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35662                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35663                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35664                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35665                                          retn			;
 35666                                  not_backspace:
 35667                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35668                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35669                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35670                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35671                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35672                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35673                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35674                                          jmp	short print2
 35675                                  
 35676                                  select_done:
 35677                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35678                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35679                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35680                                  
 35681                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35682                                  
 35683                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35684                                  
 35685                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35686                                  ;
 35687                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35688                                  ;
 35689                                  ;   INPUT
 35690                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35691                                  ;
 35692                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35693                                  ;       None
 35694                                  ;
 35695                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35696                                  ;       None
 35697                                  ;
 35698                                  ;   NOTES
 35699                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35700                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35701                                  ;
 35702                                  ;   HISTORY
 35703                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35704                                  ;
 35705                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35706                                  
 35707                                  disp_input:
 35708                                          push    ax
 35709                                          cmp     al,' '
 35710                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35711                                          mov     al,' '
 35712                                  disp_ok:
 35713                                          mov     dl,al
 35714                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35715                                          int     21h
 35716                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35717                                          call    print
 35718                                          pop     ax
 35719                                          retn
 35720                                  
 35721                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35722                                  
 35723                                  disp_num:
 35724                                          push    bx
 35725                                          add     al,'0'
 35726                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35727                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35728                                          mov     cx,1
 35729                                          int     10h
 35730                                          pop     bx
 35731                                          retn
 35732                                  
 35733                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35734                                  ;
 35735                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35736                                  ;
 35737                                  ;   INPUT
 35738                                  ;       None
 35739                                  ;
 35740                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35741                                  ;       None
 35742                                  ;
 35743                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35744                                  ;       None
 35745                                  ;
 35746                                  ;   NOTES
 35747                                  ;       None
 35748                                  ;
 35749                                  ;   HISTORY
 35750                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35751                                  ;
 35752                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35753                                  
 35754                                  show_status:
 35755                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35756                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35757                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35758                                          int     10h             ;
 35759                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35760                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35761                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35762                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35763                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35764                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35765                                          int     10h             ;
 35766                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35767                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35768                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35769                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35770                                  show_onoff: 
 35771                                          int     10h
 35772                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35773                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35774                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35775                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35776                                  
 35777                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35778                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35779                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35780                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35781                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35782                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35783                                          int     10h             ;
 35784                                  show_done:                      ;
 35785                                          pop     dx              ;
 35786                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35787                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35788                                          pop     bx              ;
 35789                                          retn			;
 35790                                  
 35791                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35792                                  
 35793                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35794                                  ;
 35795                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35796                                  ;
 35797                                  ;   INPUT
 35798                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35799                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35800                                  ;
 35801                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35802                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35803                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35804                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35805                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35806                                  ;
 35807                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35808                                  ;       AX
 35809                                  ;
 35810                                  ;   NOTES
 35811                                  ;       None
 35812                                  ;
 35813                                  ;   HISTORY
 35814                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35815                                  ;
 35816                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35817                                  
 35818                                  skip_token:
 35819                                          call    get_char
 35820                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35821                                          call    any_delim
 35822                                          jne	short skip_token
 35823                                  skip_check_eol:
 35824                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35825                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35826                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35827                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35828                                          clc
 35829                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35830                                  	retn
 35831                                  skip_token_eol:
 35832                                          stc
 35833                                  skip_token_done:
 35834                                          retn
 35835                                  
 35836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35837                                  ;
 35838                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35839                                  ;
 35840                                  ;   INPUT
 35841                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35842                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35843                                  ;
 35844                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35845                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35846                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35847                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35848                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35849                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35850                                  ;
 35851                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35852                                  ;       AX
 35853                                  ;
 35854                                  ;   NOTES
 35855                                  ;       None
 35856                                  ;
 35857                                  ;   HISTORY
 35858                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35859                                  ;
 35860                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35861                                  
 35862                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35863                                          call    get_char        ;
 35864                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35865                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35866                                          call    delim           ;
 35867                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35868                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35869                                  
 35870                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35871                                  ;
 35872                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35873                                  ;
 35874                                  ;   INPUT
 35875                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35876                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35877                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35878                                  ;
 35879                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35880                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35881                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35882                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35883                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35884                                  ;
 35885                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35886                                  ;       AX
 35887                                  ;
 35888                                  ;   NOTES
 35889                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35890                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35891                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35892                                  ;
 35893                                  ;   HISTORY
 35894                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35895                                  ;
 35896                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35897                                  
 35898                                  skip_opt_line:
 35899                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35900                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35901                                       
 35902                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35903                                  
 35904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35905                                  ;
 35906                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35907                                  ;
 35908                                  ;   INPUT
 35909                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35910                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35911                                  ;
 35912                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35913                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35914                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35915                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35916                                  ;
 35917                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35918                                  ;       AX
 35919                                  ;
 35920                                  ;   NOTES
 35921                                  ;       None
 35922                                  ;
 35923                                  ;   HISTORY
 35924                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35925                                  ;
 35926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35927                                  
 35928                                  skip_line:
 35929                                          call    get_char
 35930                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35931                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35932                                          jne	short skip_line
 35933                                  skip_line_done:
 35934                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35935                                          retn
 35936                                  
 35937                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35938                                  ;
 35939                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35940                                  ;
 35941                                  ;   INPUT
 35942                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35943                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35944                                  ;
 35945                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35946                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35947                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35948                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35949                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35950                                  ;
 35951                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35952                                  ;       AX
 35953                                  ;
 35954                                  ;   NOTES
 35955                                  ;       None
 35956                                  ;
 35957                                  ;   HISTORY
 35958                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35959                                  ;
 35960                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35961                                  
 35962                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35963                                  
 35964                                  get_number:
 35965                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35966                                  num_loop:
 35967                                          call    get_char        ;
 35968                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35969                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35970                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35971                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35972                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35973                                          push    ax              ;
 35974                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35975                                          push    dx              ;
 35976                                          mul     bx              ;
 35977                                          pop     dx              ;
 35978                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35979                                          pop     ax              ;
 35980                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35981                                          cbw                     ;
 35982                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35983                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35984                                  
 35985                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35986                                  ;num_done:
 35987                                          ;retn
 35988                                  
 35989                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35990                                  ;
 35991                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35992                                  ;
 35993                                  ;   INPUT
 35994                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35995                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35996                                  ;
 35997                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35998                                  ;       AL == next character
 35999                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36000                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36001                                  ;
 36002                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36003                                  ;       AX
 36004                                  ;
 36005                                  ;   NOTES
 36006                                  ;       None
 36007                                  ;
 36008                                  ;   HISTORY
 36009                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36010                                  ;
 36011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36012                                  
 36013                                  get_char:
 36014                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36015                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36016                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36017                                  	es	
 36018                                  	lodsb
 36019                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36020                                          retn			;
 36021                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36022                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36023                                  nearby_ret:
 36024                                          retn
 36025                                  
 36026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36027                                  ;
 36028                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36029                                  ;
 36030                                  ;   INPUT
 36031                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36032                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36033                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36034                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36035                                  ;
 36036                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36037                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36038                                  ;
 36039                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36040                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36041                                  ;
 36042                                  ;   NOTES
 36043                                  ;       None
 36044                                  ;
 36045                                  ;   HISTORY
 36046                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36047                                  ;
 36048                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36049                                  
 36050                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36051                                  query_user:
 36052                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36053                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36054                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36055                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36056                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36057                                  qu_1:
 36058                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36059                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36060                                          push    ax                      ;
 36061                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36062                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36063                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36064                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36065                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36066                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36067                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36068                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36069                                  query_all:
 36070                                  
 36071                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36072                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36073                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36074                                  
 36075                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36076                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36077                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36078                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36079                                  
 36080                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36081                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36082                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36083                                  find_match:                             ;
 36084                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36085                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36086                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36087                                          inc     di                      ;
 36088                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36089                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36090                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36091                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36092                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36093                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36094                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36095                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 36096                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36097                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36098                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36099                                          inc     di                      ;
 36100                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36101                                          int     21h                     ;
 36102                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 36103                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36104                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36105                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36106                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36107                                  cmd_notset:
 36108                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36109                                  line_print:                             ;
 36110                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36111                                          es
 36112                                  	lodsb
 36113                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 36114                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 36115                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 36116                                  non_null:                               ;
 36117                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36118                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36119                                          jne	short non_space		;
 36120                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36121                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 36122                                  non_space:                              ;
 36123                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36124                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36125                                          int     21h                     ;
 36126                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 36127                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36128                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36129                                  
 36130                                  generic_prompt:
 36131                                          call    print                   ;
 36132                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36133                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36134                                          int     16h                     ;
 36135                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36136                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 36137                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36138                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 36139                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36140                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36141                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36142                                  not_func:
 36143                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36144                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36145                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36146                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 36147                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36148                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 36149                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 36150                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 36151                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 36152                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 36153                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 36154                                  legal_char:                             ;
 36155                                          call    disp_input              ;
 36156                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36157                                  
 36158                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 36159                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 36160                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36161                                  	clc
 36162                                  do_cmd:
 36163                                  	pop     ax			;
 36164                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36165                                  	; cf=0
 36166                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 36167                                  	retn
 36168                                  
 36169                                  skip_cmd:
 36170                                  	pop     ax			;
 36171                                  skip_all:
 36172                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 36173                                  	stc
 36174                                  	retn
 36175                                  
 36176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36177                                  ;
 36178                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 36179                                  ;
 36180                                  ;   INPUT
 36181                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 36182                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36183                                  ;
 36184                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36185                                  ;       None
 36186                                  ;
 36187                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36188                                  ;       None
 36189                                  ;
 36190                                  ;   NOTES
 36191                                  ;       None
 36192                                  ;
 36193                                  ;   HISTORY
 36194                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36195                                  ;
 36196                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36197                                  
 36198                                  print_error:
 36199                                          push    ax
 36200                                          push    bx
 36201                                          push    cx
 36202                                          push    dx
 36203                                          push    ds
 36204                                          push    cs
 36205                                          pop     ds
 36206                                          pushf
 36207                                          call    get_linenum
 36208                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 36209                                          call    error_line
 36210                                          popf
 36211                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 36212                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 36213                                          call    print
 36214                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 36215                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 36216                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 36217                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 36218                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 36219                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 36220                                  pe_1:     
 36221                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 36222                                          call    print
 36223                                  pe_ret: 
 36224                                  	pop     ds
 36225                                          pop     dx
 36226                                          pop     cx
 36227                                          pop     bx
 36228                                          pop     ax
 36229                                  	retn
 36230                                  
 36231                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36232                                  
 36233                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36234                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 36235                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36236                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36237                                  
 36238                                  disable_autoexec:
 36239                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36240                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36241                                  
 36242                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36243                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 36244                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36245                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 36246                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36247                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36248                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36249                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36250                                  dae_1:
 36251                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36252                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36253                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36254                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36255                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36256                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36257                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 36258                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 36259                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36260                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 36261                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36262                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36263                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36264                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 36265                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 36266                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 36267                                          dec     bx                      ;
 36268                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 36269                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 36270                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 36271                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 36272                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 36273                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 36274                                          retn
 36275                                  
 36276                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 36277                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36278                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36279                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 36280                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36281                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 36282                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 36283                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 36284                                  
 36285                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36286                                  
 36287                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 36288                                  
 36289                                  
 36290                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36291                                  
 36292                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36293                                  ;
 36294                                  ; procedure : delim
 36295                                  ;
 36296                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36297                                  
 36298                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36299                                  ;
 36300                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36301                                  ;
 36302                                  ;any_delim:
 36303                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36304                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36305                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36306                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36307                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 36308                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36309                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 36310                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36311                                  ;
 36312                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36313                                  
 36314                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36315                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36316                                  delim:
 36317 00002FC3 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36318 00002FC5 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36319                                  
 36320 00002FC7 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36321 00002FC9 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36322                                  
 36323                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36324 00002FCB 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36325 00002FCD 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36326 00002FCF 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36327 00002FD1 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36328 00002FD3 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36329 00002FD5 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36330 00002FD7 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36331 00002FD9 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36332 00002FDB 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36333                                  
 36334                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36335                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36336                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36337 00002FDD F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 36338                                  ;endif
 36339                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36340                                  delim_ret:
 36341                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 36342 00002FDE C3                      	retn
 36343                                  
 36344                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36345                                  ;
 36346                                  ; procedure : newline
 36347                                  ;
 36348                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 36349                                  ;
 36350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36351                                  
 36352                                  newline:
 36353 00002FDF E80600                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 36354 00002FE2 72FA                    	jc	short nl_ret
 36355 00002FE4 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 36356 00002FE6 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 36357                                  
 36358                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36359                                  	;call	getchr
 36360                                  ;nl_ret:
 36361                                  	;retn
 36362                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36363                                  	;jmp	short getchr
 36364                                  
 36365                                  ; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36366                                  %if 1

 36405                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36406                                  ;
 36407                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36408                                  
 36409                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36410                                  mapcase:
 36411 00002FFF 51                      	push	cx
 36412 00003000 56                      	push	si
 36413 00003001 1E                      	push	ds
 36414                                  
 36415 00003002 06                      	push	es
 36416 00003003 1F                      	pop	ds
 36417                                  
 36418                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36419                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36420                                  ;
 36421                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36422                                  ;;else
 36423                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36424                                  ;;endif
 36425                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36426 00003004 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36427                                  
 36428                                  convloop:
 36429 00003006 AC                      	lodsb
 36430 00003007 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36431 00003009 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36432 0000300B 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36433 0000300D 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36434 0000300F 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36435 00003011 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36436                                  noconv:
 36437                                  
 36438                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36439                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36440                                  ;;
 36441                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36442                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36443                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36444                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36445                                  ;;
 36446                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36447                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36448                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36449                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36450                                  ;check_eol:
 36451                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36452                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36453                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36454                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36455                                  ;;endif
 36456                                  	
 36457                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36458 00003014 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36459                                  convdone:
 36460 00003016 1F                      	pop	ds
 36461 00003017 5E                      	pop	si
 36462 00003018 59                      	pop	cx
 36463 00003019 C3                      	retn

 36466                                  ;
 36467                                  ; procedure : round
 36468                                  ;
 36469                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36470                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36471                                  ;
 36472                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36473                                  
 36474                                  round:
 36475                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36476 0000301A 1E                      	push	ds
 36477 0000301B 0E                      	push	cs
 36478 0000301C 1F                      	pop	ds
 36479                                  
 36480 0000301D 50                      	push	ax
 36481                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36482 0000301E A1[DE03]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 36483                                  
 36484 00003021 E888E0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36485                                  
 36486                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36487 00003024 0106[E003]              	add	[memhi],ax
 36488                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36489 00003028 C706[DE03]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 36490                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36491 0000302E A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 36492                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36493 00003031 3B06[A302]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 36494 00003035 7320                    	jae	short mem_err
 36495                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36496 00003037 F606[1814]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36497 0000303C 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36498 0000303E 06                      	push	es
 36499 0000303F 56                      	push	si
 36500                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36501 00003040 8B36[1614]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 36502 00003044 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36503 00003046 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36504 00003048 48                      	dec	ax
 36505                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36506 00003049 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36507                                  	;and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36508 0000304D 8026[1814]FD            	and	byte [setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36509 00003052 5E                      	pop	si
 36510 00003053 07                      	pop	es
 36511                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 36512 00003054 58                      	pop	ax
 36513                                  
 36514                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36515 00003055 1F                      	pop	ds
 36516                                  
 36517                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36518                                  	; cf = 0
 36519                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36520                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 36521 00003056 C3                      	retn
 36522

 36562                                  todigit:

 36565                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36566 00003087 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 36567                                  	;cmp	al,9
 36568                                  	;ja	short notdig
 36569                                  	;clc
 36570                                  	;retn

 36579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36580                                  ;
 36581                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36582                                  ;
 36583                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36584                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36585                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36586                                  ;
 36587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36588                                  
 36589                                  getnum:
 36590 0000308D 53                      	push	bx
 36591 0000308E 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36592                                  b2:
 36593 00003090 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36594 00003093 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36595                                  
 36596 00003095 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36597 00003096 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36598                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36599                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36600 00003097 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36601 00003099 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36602 0000309B 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36603 0000309C 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36604 0000309E 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36605 000030A1 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36606                                  
 36607 000030A3 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36608                                  
 36609 000030A4 E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36610 000030A7 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36611 000030A9 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36612 000030AB 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36613 000030AD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36614 000030AF 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36615 000030B1 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36616 000030B3 7417                    	je	short b15
 36617 000030B5 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36618 000030BA 7410                    	je	short b15
 36619 000030BC 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36620                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36621                                  	;nop
 36622                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36623                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36624                                  	;nop
 36625                                  	;nop
 36626 000030BE 740C                    	je	short b15
 36627 000030C0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36628 000030C2 7408                    	je	short b15
 36629 000030C4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36630 000030C6 7404                    	je	short b15
 36631 000030C8 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36632 000030CA 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36633                                  b15:
 36634 000030CC 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36635 000030D1 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36636                                  b1:
 36637 000030D6 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36638 000030D8 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36639 000030DA 5B                      	pop	bx
 36640 000030DB C3                      	retn
 36641                                  badnum:
 36642                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36643                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36644 000030DC 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36645                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36646 000030DE 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36647 000030E2 5B                      	pop	bx
 36648 000030E3 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36649 000030E4 C3                      	retn
 36650                                  
 36651                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36652                                  
 36653                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36654                                  
 36655                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36656                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36657                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36658                                  ;	si = 0
 36659                                  ;	ax = country id
 36660                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36661                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36662                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36663                                  ;
 36664                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36665                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36666                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36667                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36668                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36669                                  
 36670                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36671                                  
 36672 000030E5 57                      	push	di
 36673 000030E6 50                      	push	ax
 36674 000030E7 52                      	push	dx
 36675                                  
 36676 000030E8 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36677 000030EA 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36678 000030EC B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36679 000030EF E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36680 000030F2 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36681                                  
 36682 000030F4 06                      	push	es
 36683 000030F5 56                      	push	si
 36684                                  
 36685 000030F6 0E                      	push	cs
 36686 000030F7 07                      	pop	es
 36687                                  
 36688 000030F8 BF[5C33]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36689 000030FB B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36690 000030FE F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36691                                  
 36692 00003100 5E                      	pop	si
 36693 00003101 07                      	pop	es
 36694 00003102 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36695                                  
 36696 00003104 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36697 00003107 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36698 0000310A 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36699                                  
 36700 0000310C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36701 0000310D 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36702 0000310F 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36703 00003112 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36704 00003115 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36705 00003118 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36706                                  
 36707 0000311A 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36708 0000311C 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36709 00003120 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36710                                  
 36711 00003122 46                      	inc	si
 36712 00003123 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36713 00003124 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36714 00003125 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36715 00003126 5F                      	pop	di
 36716                                  
 36717                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36718 00003127 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36719 0000312A 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36720                                  
 36721                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36722                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36723                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36724 0000312C 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 36725 0000312E 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 36726 00003130 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36727 00003133 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36728                                  
 36729                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36730 00003135 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36731 00003137 46                      	inc	si
 36732 00003138 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36733 00003139 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36734                                  
 36735                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36736                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36737 0000313B 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 36738                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36739 0000313C F9                      	stc
 36740 0000313D C3                      	retn
 36741                                  
 36742                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36743 0000313E 5E                      	pop	si
 36744 0000313F 59                      	pop	cx
 36745 00003140 5F                      	pop	di
 36746 00003141 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36747                                  
 36748                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36749 00003143 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36750                                  
 36751                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36752 00003146 2E8916[6433]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36753 0000314B 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36754 0000314E 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36755 00003151 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36756 00003154 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36757 00003157 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36758                                  
 36759 00003159 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36760 0000315B 46                      	inc	si
 36761 0000315C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 36762                                  
 36763                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36764 0000315D 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36765 0000315E 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 36766 0000315F 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 36767                                  
 36768 00003160 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 36769 00003163 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 36770 00003166 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 36771                                  
 36772 00003168 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 36773 0000316B 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36774 0000316E B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36775 00003171 F9                      	stc
 36776 00003172 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36777 00003174 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36778                                  
 36779 00003176 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36780 00003179 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36781 0000317C B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36782 0000317E F9                      	stc
 36783 0000317F CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36784 00003181 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36785                                  
 36786 00003183 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36787 00003185 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36788                                  
 36789 00003187 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36790 0000318A 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36791 0000318D B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36792 00003190 F9                      	stc
 36793 00003191 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 36794 00003193 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36795                                  
 36796 00003195 56                      	push	si
 36797 00003196 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 36798 00003199 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36799 0000319B 5E                      	pop	si
 36800 0000319C BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36801 0000319F 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36802 000031A2 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36803 000031A4 F9                      	stc
 36804 000031A5 CD21                    	int	21h
 36805 000031A7 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36806                                  
 36807 000031A9 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36808 000031AB 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36809                                  
 36810 000031AD 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 36811 000031B0 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36812 000031B3 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36813 000031B5 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36814 000031B6 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36815 000031B7 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36816 000031BB 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36817                                  
 36818                                  	;if	bugfix
 36819 000031BD E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 36820                                  	;endif
 36821                                  
 36822 000031C0 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36823 000031C2 7511                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36824                                  
 36825 000031C4 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36826                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36827 000031C8 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36828                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36829                                  	
 36830 000031CC 57                      	push	di			;save di
 36831                                  
 36832                                  	;push	ax
 36833                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 36834                                  	;mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 36835                                  	;pop	ax
 36836                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36837 000031CD 2EFF36[6433]            	push	word [cs:cntrycodepage_id]
 36838 000031D2 8F4404                  	pop	word [si+4]
 36839                                  
 36840                                  setdoscntry_mov:

 36842 000031D7 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?

 36844

 36846 000031DC 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]

 36912                                  getcountrydestination:
 36913                                  
 36914                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36915                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36916                                  ;
 36917                                  ;input: al - data id
 36918                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36919                                  ;on return:
 36920                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36921                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36923                                  
 36924                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36925                                  
 36926 0000320A 51                      	push	cx
 36927                                  	;add	di,74
 36928 0000320B 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36929                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36930 0000320E 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36931 00003211 47                      	inc	di
 36932 00003212 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36933                                  
 36934                                  getcntrydest:

 36939 0000321C 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 36940                                  
 36941 0000321E 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 36942 00003221 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 36943                                  
 36944                                  getcntrydest_1:
 36945                                  	;add	di,41
 36946 00003223 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 36947                                  getcntrydest_loop:

 36949 00003228 F9                      	stc
 36950                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 36951                                  getcntrydest_exit:

 36953 00003229 59                      	pop	cx
 36954 0000322A C3                      	retn
 36955
