 36978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36979                                  
 36980                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36981                                  
 36982                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36983                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36984                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36985                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36986                                  ;
 36987                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36988                                  ;	 be moved.
 36989                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36990                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36991                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36992                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36993                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36994                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36996                                  
 36997 00003235 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36998 00003236 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36999 00003239 F9                      	stc
 37000 0000323A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37001 0000323C 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37002 0000323D 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37003                                  
 37004 0000323F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37005 00003241 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37006 00003243 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37007 00003245 F9                      	stc
 37008 00003246 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37009                                  ricb_exit:
 37010 00003248 C3                      	retn
 37011

 37016                                  %if 0
 37017                                  
 37018                                  set_country_path:
 37019                                  
 37020                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37021                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37022                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37023                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37024                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37025                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37026                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37027                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37028                                  
 37029                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37030                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37031                                  
 37032                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37033                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37034                                  
 37035                                  	push	si
 37036                                  
 37037                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37038                                  	push	es
 37039                                  	pop	ds
 37040                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37041                                  
 37042                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37043                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37044                                  
 37045                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37046                                  	inc	si
 37047                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37048                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37049                                  
 37050                                  scp_default_drv:
 37051                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37052                                  	int	21h
 37053                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37054                                  
 37055                                  scp_setdrv:
 37056                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37057                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37058                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37059                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37060                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37061                                  
 37062                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37063                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37064                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37065                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37066                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37067                                  
 37068                                  scp_root_dir:
 37069                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37070                                  scp_path:
 37071                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37072                                  
 37073                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37074                                  scpath_exit:
 37075                                  
 37076                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37077                                  	push	es
 37078                                  	pop	ds
 37079                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37080                                  
 37081                                  	pop	si
 37082                                  	retn
 37083                                  
 37084                                  %endif
 37085                                  
 37086                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 37090                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 37091                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 37092                                  ;carry set if not.
 37093
